Name: BHOJOHORI MANNA, Puri - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Opted for this restaurant for a couple of meals on our recent family outing to Puri. 
From my previous visit to Puri, some 15 years ago, I remembered this restaurant to be at the ground floor of Hotel Pulin Puri. Bhojohari Manna was an upcoming,...talk-of-the-town brand at that time. This time around, found it to be shifted to a new address, but the good part is that they retained the quality and the taste.
The restaurant is located in the lane adjacent to Puri Hotel, some 50 meters from the Sea Beach Road. The dining area is rather small, but nicely put up with visually soothing and comfortable ambience. Staff are very efficient and polite. And above all, found the food to be tasty with a few scope for improvements.
My recommendations are Rongpuri Fish Fry, Kosha Mangsho, Daab Chingri and Basanti Pulao. Found the jumbo Chital fish to be a bit tasteless (not the gravy but the fish itself) and the luchi could be better (most of them were flat and not 'phulko'). Also, perhaps the portions served could be a bit larger. 
The signature dish seemed to be the Daab Chingri, but you will have to go early during the meal times as this item gets over quickly.More

Name: BHOJOHORI MANNA, Puri - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: We always eat at this restaurant during our Puri visit, but this time we found the taste a bit too sweet. It was quite a disappointment and we didn’t have more than two meals. We went to other options. Another problem which the restaurant has...nothing to do with, is the quality of diners this time. In future we would visit this restaurant but not depend on it as much as in the past.More

Name: BHOJOHORI MANNA, Puri - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: The restaurant is located at the next by-lane of Puri hotel. Visited for a dinner at around 8.15 pm, when restaurant was almost vacant. As the name suggests, it is predominantly a Bengali cuisine restaurant. The restaurant has normal ambience.  We ordered Bhetki Rongpuri fry,...veg pulao, chicken duck bungalow and boneless mutton. All the dishes were tasty, especially boneless mutton, but the serving potions were too small as compared to the price, it was just enough for one person. The chicken and mutton dishes were served with 2 or 3 pieces at the prices range of Rs. 250 and Rs. 300 plus respectively. At the end, we ordered nolen gurer ice cream, which was lovely. Price-wise, by and large comparable with other similar Bengali cuisine restaurants but small serving portion is a sore point. Nevertheless, being a famous Bengali restaurant chain, a visit is recommended for authentic Bengali cuisines.More

Name: THREESIXTYONE DEGREES, Gurugram (Gurgaon) - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options
Quote: Delightful experience esp of Indian cuisine
Detail Review:
I had an incredible dining experience at Threesixtyone in The Oberoi, Gurgaon during a dinner party on August 10, 2023. The service provided by Ms. Neelakshi, Mr. Savinay, and Chef Sahil Batra was truly exceptional. Ms. Neelakshi's warm and attentive assistance added a personal touch...to our evening, while Mr. Savinay's knowledge of the menu and wine pairings made our meal even more delightful.

Chef Sahil Batra's culinary expertise shone through in the Indian dishes we savored. The Guchhie Matar was a burst of flavors, and the Vegetarian Haandi Biryani was a fragrant masterpiece that left us craving for more. The Bharwan Paneer Tikka was a tantalizing combination of textures and spices, showcasing Chef Batra's creativity.

Overall, our experience at Threesixtyone was a gastronomic delight, enhanced by the impeccable service of Ms. Neelakshi and Mr. Savinay, along with the culinary brilliance of Chef Sahil Batra. This evening was truly unforgettable, and I can't wait to return for another culinary journey at Threesixtyone in the future.More

One of those rare spaces that are perfect whether it's a business lunch or a romantic dinner. 

A vast dining area overlooking a serene pool of water enclosed within high glass walls. This place has a very Zen yet trendy vibe to it. 

The service,as...is expected, is top notch - unobtrusive yet polished. We hosted a business lunch and the F&B team worked diligently to curate a menu and supervise the layouts. All our guests thoroughly enjoyed the curated food, drinks, and the ambience of the place.

Clearly the top choice for dining in Gurgaon !More

Name: THREESIXTYONE DEGREES, Gurugram (Gurgaon) - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options
Quote: They don’t care unless you say ‘TripAdvisor’
Detail Review:
I was there with my family - 9 of us
Out of which - 2 were seniors- My mom & Mom In Law
We entered the restaurant around 7.28pm since we have our supper early
There was a long table available in the first section...of the restaurant 
We asked for it - since my Mom in Law- has problems walking 
Now here our experience of going there was already ruined- Jashn Chhabra (Restaurant manager) refused us that table on the pretext that it was reserved- at that point of time - in the whole restaurant the occupancy was perhaps 10-20% - & even it was reserved- seeing the condition of the seniors- he should’ve considered that - since there were entire sections - Empty - he could have easily reallocated the tables
On top of that - he was rude & went & stood in a corner - instead of taking us to the next table 
Anyhow we were seated - & then when we complained - since that table was empty till the time we left (10.30pm)
Abhimanyu Agarwal started justifying his team’s actions- which was completely unacceptable 
No Empathy at all 
And then when one of us - said that we’ll write on TripAdvisor- everyone suddenly started feeling very apologetic
Is this service 
That too from an Oberoi’s A class restaurant 
These guys should really do a reality checkMore

Name: UTSAV FINE DINE, Nashik - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Optional Visit : Good ambience, average food
Detail Review:
(1) We visited this restaurant around Diwali and the restaurant was full. It has an open sitting plan under a large shade, after a small garden greets you near the entrance.
(2) Service was good but couldn’t cope with the full crowd in festival mood....There was delay in cleaning the tables, taking order and serving the food, but we understood the reasons and didn’t complain.
(3) The starters, main course and accompaniments were fresh and served hot, but lacked the punch. We ordered Masala Papad, 2 Subjees, Paratha, Naans, Rotis, Fried Rice, Daal etc. 
(4) The taste was average and nothing really stood out.
(5) There is open space outside for children, the wash rooms were moderately clean.
(6) Overall an average experience.More

Name: UTSAV FINE DINE, Nashik - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: CELEBRATION OF QUALITY FOOD AT UTSAV RESTAURANT IN NASHIK
Detail Review:
Situated in the heart of Nashik, Utsav Restaurant at Gangapur Road is worth a visit if you are someone who prefers enjoying food without much rush or hullabaloo around.  This multi-cuisine restaurant will surely win your heart with the quality of food they serve and...atmosphere they have created!

There are variety of reasons why we won't think twice before recommending this restaurant, especially if you are planning to dine out with family.

We are highly impressed with the ambience of Utsav Restaurant. The traditional wall hangings perfectly compliment the beautiful pieces of artworks and carvings on the wall. The sitting arrangement is pretty well taken care of and the soulful instrumental soundtracks certainly adds to the overall dining experience. The best part is that there isn't much disturbance due to the limited seating, which makes it a perfect place to enjoy your family conversations without any worries.

The best part about the food served here is that you won't be disappointed with any kind of cuisine. We tried out various kinds of dishes and the way this restaurants manages to keep up with the taste and professionalism of each cuisine is simply commendable.

As far the starters are concerned, the freshness of the Tomato soup as well as the Manhow soup touched our hearts as soon as we took the first sip. The Tomato soup was topped with sufficient amount of cream and butter where as the Manchow soup was accompanied with more than enough fried noodles.

Though we would like to mention that the starter we ordered was not up to the mark, it tasted good but the crisp which is an essential in Veg Crispy seemed to be lacking somewhere.

Though we would like to mention that the starter we ordered was not up to the mark, it tasted good but the crisp which is an essential in Veg Crispy seemed to be lacking somewhere.

Finding an authentic Sizzling Chocolate Brownie is one tough task in Nashik but glad we have found yet another restaurant that serves an appetizing brownie in the city. The brownie was served sizzling hot and the pineapple base as well as the juicy cherry on top provided made it taste even more awesome!

Our Ratings & Recommendations:
FOOD: 4.8/5
SERVICE: 4.3/5
PRICE: Moderate
OVERALL EXPERIENCE: 8.2/10More

Name: SAGAR RATNA, New Delhi - Sagar Ratna Chaudhary Balbir Singh Marg - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options
Detail Review:
The place is on first floor and it has simple decor but very clean. We ordered 
-cheese veggie dosa - it was cheesy and yummy
-butter masala dosa - buttery dosa was tasty
-deluxe thali - it had pickle, salad, raita, papad, sabzi(mix) , dal...makhni, paneer , chutney, rice and naan. It was amazing and stomach filling.
-chilly paneer - it was spicy and delectable 
- mysore pak - it was hot soft and delicious 
Overall a great experience. But the price was on a higher side.More

Name: SAGAR RATNA, New Delhi - Sagar Ratna Chaudhary Balbir Singh Marg - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options
Detail Review:
Visited this place yesterday with my friends,am a big south indian cuisine fan and one of my friend suggested me Sagar Ratna so we decided to try this place out.
As soon as we entered the place,we were quite impressed by the ambiance it's pretty...good and also slow music in the background was making it more dope.We settled ourselves and ordered
Strawberry and green apple mojitos-they were quite good and refreshing too,then we ordered idli chaat which was quite delicious and yoghurt used was fresh and good then paneer tikka-paneer was very soft ,creamy and very tasty and with sauces it felt awesome on tastebuds
In South Indian we tried rava masala dosa,cheese dosa and uttapam with coconut chutney and sambhar,they all were so delicious and best was cheese dosa which contains lots of cheese and veggies.
In desserts we tried gulab jamun with ice cream which was nice and mysore pak which was normal
Staff was very friendly and service was awesome.
This place is definitely worth a try,you will love itMore

Name: PIND BALLUCHI, Bhiwadi - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Pind Baluchi is one of those restaurants where in you can expect true flavors of North India albeit a rather high price. Though you can use corporate discounts and online offers here to make some sanity of the prices, you might still find yourself wondering...why was it so expensive? Talking about the taste, I am a pure vegetarian so I could not comment on many items available here, but those which I did taste I found them to be rich on taste (and ghee of course) and combined with hard drinks (yes they serve that as well) and the desi ambience (brass glasses and traditional decor), it was a worthy experience. You don't have places like this anywhere nearby so that is also an added advantage for it.More

Name: PIND BALLUCHI, Bhiwadi - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Quote: Good quality if you are willing to afford!!
Detail Review:
Capitol mall in Bhiwadi is one of the most sought out hangout place in Bhiwadi. Pind Baluchi is one of its most expensive places for dine-in. The times I have been here, I haven't seen more than 2-3 tables occupied. Though Pind Baluchi is a...popular chain in Indian restaurants, I found this particular place better than its counterparts in terms of quality and service. It's a family resto-bar and is most famous for its Indian cuisines, especially Punjabi food. We had lunch of dal, raita, mixed veg and paneer accompanied with garlic Naan, and needless to say the food was delicious and tasteful. In dessert we went for Matka kulfi and gulabjamun which were again a rich experience. 
Caution: they serve a hefty quantity and also charge accordingly, so I would recommend to order less than you are used to order in other restaurants.More

Name: PIND BALLUCHI, Bhiwadi - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor

Food taste is seventh heaven, ambiance is really soothing with traditional Indian and divine with lots of sculptures  and lots of buddha to make you feel deeper with food meditation it's divine. We find that they serve very high quality of stuff where  no preservative base souce, you must have to wait fresh signature food, Guys don't go in hurry they make all fresh as per requirements and do care for your present health and customise the food, Mr Kamal is not just good chef but he is most patriotic person with globle soul who is in mission for great public health. He want to hook your three generation with love and affection with hearty care. We been overwhelmed to here his vision and thought about country and county fellow and globle community. Must visite place in Calangute,  must talk to Master Chef Kamal varna and his family who just will make you to come again and again for life time. Thank you chef for your love and sharing. Love from Sunil  And friends Kanpur UP.More

Name: SPICY BELLA, Calangute - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Italian, Chinese, Indian, Mediterranean, Thai, Asian, Healthy
Detail Review: Spicy Bella is a fantastic establishment in the heart of Calangute. I thoroughly enjoyed my authentic Goan meal, so far the tastiest I’ve had in Goa. It was also fantastic to hear about the restaurants history and have a great conversation with the owner, Kamal....I highly recommend to visit here!More

Name: SPICY BELLA, Calangute - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Italian, Chinese, Indian, Mediterranean, Thai, Asian, Healthy
Quote: Best food I have had in a long while
Detail Review:
I have not experienced this level of taste ever before in my life. I had mutton biryani which was tastiest biryani I have ever had by a while. Every spoon of the food there is full amazing flavour.

Master Chef Kamal Varma talked to us...about what do we want to eat and presented us with one of the best meals of our lives. I have tried biryani’s all around India and my mother makes amazing biryani. But the biryani i had here was simply better than anything i have ever tasted. They put so much effort to get to know you and cook something specifically for you and you will feel the difference in your first bite of food here. I will visit Goa again just to have a meal at Spicy Bella. In the one week i spent in Goa, i went to a lot of different places but nothing came even close the food I had here.More

Name: SPICY BELLA, Calangute - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Italian, Chinese, Indian, Mediterranean, Thai, Asian, Healthy
Quote: Great spice balance with personal care
Detail Review: Excellent food and hospitality, hospitality to enjoy at Goa, We come every year to goa for business meeting and happy to say yes we enjoyed here amezing food and hospitality n this trip, Spicy Bella chef understand very well taste of Tamil people we been...recommended by our Chennai  Friend and really it's more worth to try. We had finest murgh makhni lababdar and Shahi Dum Biryani what a spice balance and touching care. Must visite place in  Calangute.More

Name: SPICY BELLA, Calangute - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Italian, Chinese, Indian, Mediterranean, Thai, Asian, Healthy

Name: SPICY BELLA, Calangute - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Italian, Chinese, Indian, Mediterranean, Thai, Asian, Healthy
Detail Review: I have been in India for over a week and the best food I have experienced to date is at the spicy bella, I had a starter, main and dessert and everything was delightful. The chef came and spoke to me and he was such...a great person, it was a very memorable experience for me, for me this is a must go to. Highly recommended.More

Name: SPICY BELLA, Calangute - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Italian, Chinese, Indian, Mediterranean, Thai, Asian, Healthy
Detail Review: The food is unique, many flavours that we had never experienced before and very tasty too. The presentation is very good, the staff courteous and the ambience is warm. Would love to go there everytime I travel to Goa.

Name: SPICY BELLA, Calangute - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Italian, Chinese, Indian, Mediterranean, Thai, Asian, Healthy
Detail Review: Food was amazing! The whole experience from start to finish was great.. loved the quick service and the chef was so friendly with the guests. Highly recommended

Name: SPICY BELLA, Calangute - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Italian, Chinese, Indian, Mediterranean, Thai, Asian, Healthy
Detail Review: Most dynamic chef who love the creativity and country fellows as brothers and do his level best to provide the most healthy food with great care of nutrition values. Most patriotic  chef we found who's every action is a epic. Must watch chef with his...action and patriotism. He really care for public health. Every guest is a Deshwasi  and fellow soul for him and he means. Food is fresh and flavourful with lots of added love like mother. I can say I have seen most dynamic chef Kamal Varma who is like volcano with his action. Must watch open kitchen and effort of all.  Must wait this is the mantra.  Cow paneer, Cow ghee, fresh ingredients and freshly cooked food with tons of love  is the main essence of the Spicy Bella. I'm overwhelmed to talk with chef and family. Must visit place in Goa. My next trip is for Goa is for Spicy Bella for sure . Thank you chef for sharing and caring and making our visit most memorable.More

Name: SPICY BELLA, Calangute - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Italian, Chinese, Indian, Mediterranean, Thai, Asian, Healthy
Quote: Food was below average - lower expectations
Detail Review: Great ambience when you walk in for a restaurant this calibre. However it wasnt smooth sailing - the cocktails took over 40mins to be made and provided - the poor chef looked like he was having to step in and do everything. The food was...sub par contrary to the reviews on here. Sadly; I would not return.More

Name: SPICY BELLA, Calangute - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Italian, Chinese, Indian, Mediterranean, Thai, Asian, Healthy
Detail Review: My recent visit to Spicy Bella was an absolute delight. What truly made the experience exceptional was the personal touch provided by the head chef Vimal.......  Not only did he take the time to understand our preferences, but they also customized each dish to perfection...both in taste and the portion size. The flavours were exquisite and the ambiance added to the overall charm. All the food we ate was fresh and aromatic. If you're looking for a dinning experience that goes above and beyond, spicy bella is a must try.More

Name: SPICY BELLA, Calangute - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Italian, Chinese, Indian, Mediterranean, Thai, Asian, Healthy
Quote: It was a wonderful and beautiful experience for us all. Owner of the restaurant personally spoken to us, we had a wonder
Detail Review: It was a wonderful and beautiful experience for us all. Owner of the restaurant personally spoken to us, we had a wonderful conversation time with him and enjoyed a lot. The food was awesomely delicious. If will visit the Goa again, beaches and spicy Bella...will be the reason to go.More

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Small Venue where you order your food the previous day. Victor relies on word of mouth to get his customers. It is located on the small lane on way to beach and very basic. When he has customers Victor makes the place looking nice with...lights and lanterns. He buys the food fresh and cooks it himself. We had Barramundi and although we are not big Fish eaters we loved it. It was divine and our best meal in the 15 days we were in Goa. He is not busy at the moment and it is such a shame. If you fancy a day off from Curries please support Victor and give him a chance. You will not regret it.More

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Arrived here late December to find Victors very quiet not many British tourists Victor even considering closing early,Fortunately trade picked up and food remains a delight,sea food in particular

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Excellent very laid back restaurant. Tiger prawns to die for, fillet steak too. Pop in and see Victor the day before you want to eat and he will take your order and cook to your liking.

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Am enjoying Victor's delicious Fish for a few seasons. Its a magnificent find, family restaurant. Dad Victor and son Aidan cannot do enough for you. The fish is caught in a river close to their home and the prawns come from their farm. Am attaching...a few photographa taken this evening.

I highly recommend this small, quaint, cosy restaurant.

Best Wishes

GladysMore

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Here today 19/12/18 Victors is closed apparently he cannot get a liecence to open. This is imformation from the stall holders on either side of him at 20:00 tonight.

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: THE BEST SEAFOOD IN THE WORLD.
Detail Review:
I,'ve known Victor since 1998 when he worked in a shack on the beach just down the road from his restaurant.He cooked my wife Pat pomfret every day. It was delicious nothing alters.On our last visit to go a  we ate there 10 times.Fantastic! We...are going back in November for more delicious food.Victor is a lovely man.
Bill and Pat.
ENGLAND.More

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: I stay in victor's hotel  in Candolim beach Goa here is a very nice and comfortable stay and food is so much delicious.room is very nice decorative and bathroom is also so big. Swimming pool is very good for kids and adults both.

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Unusual quaint family run small restaurant
Detail Review:
It’s worth a visit, the fish is superb, I enjoyed Hake and my friend enjoyed a steak with pepper sauce.

It’s licated jyst past the Whispering Palms Hotel, down a lane leading to the beach. 

When I dine at Victor’s Restaurant I usually buy a...handbag from John at the handbag shop two doors down. 

Thank you Victor for always making me feel welcome 

See you in November

Best Wishes to your son also

GladysMore

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Thank you to Victor, his staff & family for outstanding service & superb food  for my husband’s birthday.  It is advisable to book & preorder your dishes, excellent value for money & you can take your own drinks.

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Visited this place after a friend recommended me. It was not easy to find. Not a large restaurant, quite a basic place. The thing we loved was the food. Amazing service and would definitely love to visit it again.

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: It was strange to find that you ordered your food the day before your visit, but now I understand why, freshly prepared wonderful food, with brilliant service

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: We always have a meal at Victors when we visit Goa. It’s a great place to have a dinner in a quiet setting on the road that goes down to the beach. You have to book in advance and pre order your food as it...is all bought fresh and made to order. The Bombay potatoes are incredible!! You can also take your own drink, however Victor does stick kingfisher and some soft drinks. Thanks Victor, we will see you again next year!More

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Went with friends on a recommendation and was not disappointed. Very basic empty shack apart from tables and chairs. All food has to be ordered the day before to ensure freshness. I had dressed crab which is the best I have ever had, followed by...seafood platter which was to die for. Big portions and very reasonable prices.More

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Every time I come to Goa I am sure to take a trip to Victors. His hospitality and fresh food are second to none. We arrived and straight away went to book for that week. We both ordered crab to start and I had red...snapper for mains and my partner steak. The food was amazing cooked to perfection. The crab had been caught that day from victors fish farm. Defiantly recommend. You won’t be disappointed.More

Name: VICTOR'S, Candolim - Whispering Palms Rd - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Do not be put off by the picture things have changed a lot since it was taken.Victors is very popular so it is always best book in advance to avoid disappointment..  Victor's culinary skills are legendary and dressed crabs are a specialty. Fish and steak...are cooked to perfection not to mention the vegetables. Not the cheapest around but certainly the best. If you want a quiet meal without blaring music and /or entertainment then Victors is the place for you.More

Name: MASSEY, Puri - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Lovely place for all types of tasty foods. We had been to this place for a weekend dinner. We just loved the dinner and we got a great experience. Recommended hotel for all.

Name: MASSEY, Puri - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: We went to Massey for dinner after recommendation from our driver. The food was good and was very nicely prepared with a great taste.

Detail Review: I had breakfast at pluck it was amazing and food was very delicious and service was excellent buffet was very lavish and Mr prince was excellent server tha ks prince

Name: PLUCK, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Good food as always . Beautiful selection of the buffet and desserts. Vansh and brijesh were exceptional and took care of our guests very well.

Name: PLUCK, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Excellent service by Vansh , Brijesh and prince; this is what excellent hospitality is all about .. outstanding services and highly recommended

Name: PLUCK, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: I came at pluck for celebrate my daughter birthday really it's was very excellent experience and specially Prince was very good and services was very excellent thanks to prince

Name: PLUCK, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Vansh, Mirza and Pankaj were great and the food was good! We had a large group and they were attentive.

Name: PLUCK, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Great service from Vansh Mirza and Pankaj, with fun to try a variety of worldwide deliciousness. Fun to go with friends and colleagues!

Name: PLUCK, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Amazing service . Amazing food .
Amazing ambience. Thankyou for the nice hospitality Mr. Vansh and Mr. Mirza.

Name: PLUCK, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Lovely place to have a nice dinner. Great food and service, would highly recommend. Vansh in particular was very helpful.

Name: PLUCK, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Superb service and food was very delicious buffet was very lavish and Mr prince take care of my table his service was excellent thanks prince for service

Name: PLUCK, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor

Name: PLUCK, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor

Name: PLUCK, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor

Name: PLUCK, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Excellent service provided by Mirza and Brijesh !!! Would love to visit again !  Great place and great ambience !

Name: PLUCK, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor

Great spread for dinner buffet!

Name: BANSURI, Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: One of the Best hotels in Mumbai for sophisticated family get togethers.. The nonveg food is very delicious and it's a treat to done in this Restaurant.. A slightly costlier restaurant to be frank but worth the money for sure :)

Name: BANSURI, Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Decent Place for a good meal with family
Detail Review: Dined here recently with a family for an occasion. The food is decent but would recommend the Chinese over Indian food.

Name: BANSURI, Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
It was fine Indian dinner, the spice was just right. Superquick service, awesome taste specially crispy veg, tomato soup and palak soup was ok in taste..taste wise it was more than satisfactory.

Overall I enjoyed this place.

Name: BANSURI, Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: One of the oldest & worth dining restaurant in Mulund
Detail Review: This is one of the oldest & well known restaurant in Mulund East. Earlier it was called "Shera". I have been visiting it since I was a kid. The ambiance, service is a plus point. Decently priced, good on quantity. They are known for the...North Indian cuisine. Apart from these, they also serve Chinese delights which are worth a try too. The best part is that the owner personally comes to the table & interacts with the guests to know the feedback. Not many owners practice this but this is the best practice I have seen here. Many at times we order the food from here & the delivery time is also quick.More

Name: BANSURI, Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: It was fine Indian dinner, the spice was just right and one can ask for nothing more, but  say next time.

Name: BANSURI, Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Good food is the USP of this place. This restaurant located on the first floor has also a banquet. Valet parking is available. The restaurant serves Mughlai, Continental  and Chinese. Went here for a afternoon lunch with my friends and we ordered the following 1)...Chicken Shorba 2) Chicken Kabab 3) Chicken Patiyala with Rotis and Kulchas 4) Burnt garlic fried rice.Would rate all the dishes on a high scale in terms of taste and preparation. Service was also pretty good and the ambience is also decent. Washrooms are clean. Ended up with a bill of Rs 1860 for the four of us. Would love to visit againMore

Name: BANSURI, Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Its always fun eating here.. staff is attentive.. service is also good. Home delivery service is also on time.. best in mulund east...!!!

Name: BANSURI, Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Not the Same at it Was!!
Detail Review: ansuri is a Family Bar and Restaurant in Mulund.Have been visiting this place for ages now.This place is owned by a South indian(Shetty) and has still managed to retain their old staff.Used to frequent this place almost every weekend earlier but lately i feel the...restaurant is not the same it used to be in terms of the rates,quality and quantity and hence i dont really visit this place that often now.They need to really improve their service, correct their rates or provide as good quality and quantity.Visit if you dont really have other options to consider around that area.More

Name: BANSURI, Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: This is a good place for family to have get together.Owned by a south indian, serves mughlai and indian dishes.Fully air conditioned restaurant with nice ambiance.Staff is less cordial.We order chicken soup which was good in taste.For starter one should try kebab's and paneer dishes.Murg...Lahori and butter chicken is worth trying.Slight costlier in price but it's okay for once in a while.They have a banquet hall called 'Symphony' given for parties and seminars.More

Name: BANSURI, Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: I am a resident of mulund since 20 years and bansuri has been my all time favorite since equal time!! It has a gr8 likable ambience with prompt service which can be annoying sumtimes! all chicken starters and veg starters are equally good! Butter chicken...is just amazing!! Bansuri spcl veg is a good dish here. Chicken schzwan is my favorite!! Highly recomended!!More

Name: BANSURI, Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Bansuri Resturant Mulund East is a bar and family resturant. The food served is finger licking. Quality of food can not be matched. Servers and waiters are very friendly but they do not enter in our privacy zone. 
Manchow Soup & Mixed fried Rice is...worth the cost. Do try all the starters.More

Name: KURO - THE ASIAN BISTRO, Ahmedabad - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Quote: Most underrated Asian place in Ahmedabad
Detail Review: Best Asian food in town. A quaint little place inside a 5star is unheard of but literally it's a hidden gem for Asian lovers. The service is impeccable and my experience especially with Any was brilliant

Name: KURO - THE ASIAN BISTRO, Ahmedabad - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Quote: Must visit place for Asian food.
Detail Review: Great place for Asian food (especially Sushi) in Ahmedabad. This time tried the stir fry prepared by chef Gaurav and it was amazing. A must try!

Name: KURO - THE ASIAN BISTRO, Ahmedabad - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: It is always a pleasure to visit . Amazing food and very helpful and friendly service. Would recommend it to my friends and family.

Name: KURO - THE ASIAN BISTRO, Ahmedabad - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
I can vouch that one of the best Asian food in Ahmedabad. Best was Sushi. BAO was simply superb.

They way it was decorated was simply awesome.
All items which we had ordered were very tasty. Service was also very good.

Name: KURO - THE ASIAN BISTRO, Ahmedabad - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: We were served by Anu. She was lovely. The food was great too . Enjoyed our time. Will come again.

Name: KURO - THE ASIAN BISTRO, Ahmedabad - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Excellent food, good range of drinks, and amazing staff. Will be regular here for sure. Best food in the town

Name: KURO - THE ASIAN BISTRO, Ahmedabad - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Quote: Must visit place for food lovers
Detail Review: Exceptional food, warm staff and a thoroughly enjoyable evening. Visited with friends and had a wonderful evening

Name: KURO - THE ASIAN BISTRO, Ahmedabad - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Went to kuro for Sunday lunch. Ordered the asparagus tempura sushi, barbecue bao bun, and the truffle endamame dim sum for appetizer. They were all really really good, especially loved the dim sum. Ordered the Kung pao tofu and yaki udon noodles for main course....The Kung pao was perfectly spicy and  probably the best I've ever had in the city. Really enjoyed the food, and the customer service was exceptional. The ambience and decor in the restaurant was also really beautiful. Will definitely be coming back!More

Name: KURO - THE ASIAN BISTRO, Ahmedabad - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Mr.Badsha , Mr. Ruhul , Chef gourav and Niraj . Chef Neraj was very humble and for sure has all the expertise in food and ingredients. Great staff. Will visit again.

Name: MAAMS CAFE RESTAURANT, Pondicherry - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: A year-old restaurant on the North Boulevard (the present day Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Salai) about 200 m from the Northern end of the beach (Ashram Play Ground end). Very small to accommodate about 16 persons, but very neat, clean and homely. The service was prompt....Rajesh is one smart and young waiter, who consulted our requirements with concern and brought them promptly. We went for the breakfast on a Sunday and ordered Mini Breakfast that consisted of an idli, vadai, onion oothappam, kichedi (or Pongal option), a sweet and coffee. The vadai came a bit late; but fresh, hot and as homely as our own house-made one. However, the mini jilabi sweet appeared to be brought from outside. We really enjoyed the Mini Breakfast that costed Rs. 100, each. Opened from 7 am to11 pm with about an hour break before noon and evening after 4 pm on all days except Monday.More

Name: SPICE OF CHINA, Mumbai - Andheri East - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
I had an absolutely delightful experience at Spice Of China restaurant on my birthday. The highlight of the evening was the wonderful sizzlers we ordered. They were not only delicious but also a feast for the eyes as they arrived sizzling and smoking at our...table. 

What added to the charm of the evening was our first-time experience using chopsticks. The staff was incredibly patient and helpful, ensuring we could enjoy our meal with a memorable experience.

Overall, Spice Of China provided the perfect setting for my birthday celebration. The combination of delicious food, captivating sizzlers, and the novelty of using chopsticks made it an evening to remember. I can't wait to return for another special occasion or even just a casual dining experience.
Must Visit Everyone.More

Name: SPICE OF CHINA, Mumbai - Andheri East - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Spice of China truly impressed me!
Detail Review: Spice of China truly impressed me with their Chicken Crispy Lollipop and Smoked Chicken Chilly dishes. The Chicken Crispy Lollipop was perfectly cooked, with a delicious crispy coating that added a delightful crunch to each bite.  As for the Smoked Chicken Chilly, it was an...absolute flavor explosion. The smoky aroma infused the chicken beautifully, and the spicy chili gave it just the right amount of heat. Both dishes were a true delight, and I highly recommend Spice of China for their amazing chicken creations.More

Detail Review: We had issues with the buffet as there was a huge crowd and food was not getting refilled on time. I spoke with Jibin & Villan about this and they heard us out patiently and assured us that they'd rectify it. Turns out that they...were not prepared for the unexpected crowd and they had these issues because they prepare food fresh and don't reheat pre cooked food. Food was delicious, recommend   Ahaan for good vegetarian fare at Rameshwaram. Kavitha in the restaurant  was also very helpful.More

Name: JYOTI VIHAR, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
This seems to be Jyoti Vihar 1.0 - in its new avatar. 
Old timers will realise that this new avatar is a complete disaster. Absolutely nothing about this is what the iconic Jyoti Vihar was for Kolkatans. 
The ground floor which was not used earlier...has been revamped and in a cramped up area plastic tables and chairs have been some how fitted in hardly any space between two tables and absolutely no space next to each other in the table that you would sit in. There is loud , bright , garish menu board against the wall in front of a counter which serves as a talk away and self help counter. 
The staff is all gone and there is only person to serve who inspite of his best efforts is overwhelmed. 
The food is atrocious and the way it is served makes it look absolutely unpalatable. A dosa is folded to fit into a tiny plastic plate. The idly dipped in sambar which was what most people ordered there for years now comes in a shallow glass dish. The idly as hard as a rock and the dosa seemed to have been fried!! Clearly shows the kitchen staff too is gone. In all probability this place seems to have changed ownership. 
For old timers this Jyoti Vihar will come as a shock. Better to stay awayMore

Name: JYOTI VIHAR, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Those who have been to Ramakrishna Tiffin House in Deshopriyo Park will be familiar with the menu at Jyoti Vihar. Turns out the owner is the same. This one is located near the American consulate office and thereby there is no parking facility nearby. The...entrance is shabby( the room is used to sit people waiting for their turn to enter the cafe). You climb up stairs to an air conditioned enclosure. The place is cleaner than it’s sister concern. Still the cleanliness at Jyoti Vihar needs to improve with napkins lying on the ground, seepage on the wall and rather shabby look of the glasses in which water is served. This is basically a tiffin house and what you get on the menu are snacks and coffee. As expected the food is good but inferior to its sister concern. The service is decent and the prices reasonable. Probably overhyped.More

Name: JYOTI VIHAR, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Must visit for South Indian breakfast
Detail Review: The food is always fresh and piping hot. Have been coming here since my school days and the quality has remained the same all these years. Soft fluffy idlis, deliciously thin dosas and the best crisp vadas I have ever eaten. Come before 1 pm...or you will have to wait in line. But trust me, the wait is worth it.More

Name: JYOTI VIHAR, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Dosas, idlis, vadas - amongst the best in town in a typical South Indian cafe, to be washed down with a yard of frothy milky sweet coffee.

Name: JYOTI VIHAR, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: My father used to like this South Indian restaurant..I like this restaurant too...love their Masala Dosa..especially prefer the Paper Masala Dosa..they make soft and fluffy Idlis..Sambhar and chutney both need special mention..whenever I enter always get the typical South Indian flavor...a good restaurant

Name: JYOTI VIHAR, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:

It opens for lunches and is up till late evening has a great dosa called the ghee dosa and in the eastern part of India one...of the best places for south indian food. 
The Restraunt furniture is same as what it was may be 30 years ago but that does not in any way effects the quality and taste of the food.More

Name: ZOOBY'S KITCHEN, Nainital - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Quote: One of the best Restaurant in Nainital
Detail Review: I recently visited to Zoobys Kitchen in Nainital with my friends. Loved the taste and the service. Best part it’s exactly like delhi’s food. I will recommend you to try Paneer tikka, Dal makhni and Noodles

Name: ZOOBY'S KITCHEN, Nainital - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: A must visit resturant whenever you are travelling to nanital, its situated exactly on the mall road. The sitting allows you a great view of the lake. The service is quick and ambience is beautiful. Speaking about the food. I love the north indian they...serve, Paneer tikka has to be ordered everytime I visit here. They also serve great chinese particularly noodles and manchurian. Just love the overall experience.More

Name: ZOOBY'S KITCHEN, Nainital - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Google refered place, worth a visit the food was good but service can be improved. Changezi chicken was good, paratha large size.
Server was lazy.

Name: ZOOBY'S KITCHEN, Nainital - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: It's really amazing place for dinning I went here for lunch . Food was delicious and the ambition was unique just lake side .

Name: ZOOBY'S KITCHEN, Nainital - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: I really loved the experience, from ambience to food and staff all things were super satisfactory, I have ordered snacks chilly mushroom and dahi ke sholey, both the things were delicious and filling

Name: ZOOBY'S KITCHEN, Nainital - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Great Ambience and lovely Food. Restaurant uses fine quality of crockeries, drink served was very average though. Server was quick and Italian is lovely.

Name: ZOOBY'S KITCHEN, Nainital - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Ambience n staff is good
Food taste is at Par
Not that wow thing but ok overall
Next time i may NOT visit.
I have ordered Dal makhni n Paneer Butter Masala (Veg only)
3 out of 5 i would give to taste 
Qty wise...4/5.
If ur looking for spicy food like me den try someone else dat's what i may suggest.More

Name: ZOOBY'S KITCHEN, Nainital - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
This restaurant has an amazing lake view & ambiance. The food is super delicious…we had lunch at this lovely place. Must tell you, each portion is sumptuous. 
Must visit if you are visiting Nainital!!

Name: ZOOBY'S KITCHEN, Nainital - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: On mail road, overlooking the Naini Lake, the restaurant has a cool ambience.   We visited for an evening snacks and could occupy a window seat with a view of busy mall road and lake. We ordered Ice Tea, Fried and Kabab. The serving was prompt,...staffs were courteous. One can enjoy the meal with a nice view of lake / surroundings.More

Name: ESSENCE - ALL DAY DINING, Ahmedabad - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: It's been a great dinner great family get together I would like to say thanks to all essence staff special thanks goes to lakshman , Mr sishupal , rohit and Trisha who has done really good serviceMore

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Fantastic resturant in Calangute, which we ended up visiting twice during our stay. Amazon service and fantastic food in a nice atmosphere, set back from the main road. The menu features western and Indian options, which were both top quality. Chef Soumyen is a lovely...man as well as great chef and greeted each table at the end of the night.More

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Great place for dinner , lovely staff 
Our favourite place in goa so far 
Wide range of menu , every dish was 10/10

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Quote: We are never disappointed in this Restaurant
Detail Review:
Another set of visits to Soumyens Kitchen , so great changes to the menu since our last visits pre pandemic Feb 2020 .
The staff are very attentive and well trained , the food is just exquisite , perfectly cooked.
We just love this Restaurant,...well done guysMore

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Quote: A fantastic start to our holiday in Goa
Detail Review: On our first day in Goa we had no idea where to go for dinner. Fortunately we chose this fabulous restaurant. There was a really nice atmosphere, fantastic service and sublime food. The chef patron and his son couldn’t have done any more to make...our evening more enjoyable. Do give it a try if you are in the area.More

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Wonderful restaurant food is amazing staff very attentive. Definitely a must to visit if in calangute

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: What a lovely evening we had at Chef. Sounyens. The staff so polite and courteous, it was lovely to see the chef's son on duty too. Chef. Sounyen visited each and every table and spoke to the dinners (what a lively gesture by him). And...most importantly the food was oh so delicious! Thank you for your hospitality team. KudosMore

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
My only regret is that we only visited once on our 4 week holiday
My wife had butter chicken and I had fillet steak and we both enjoyed our meals very much, I would say this was my best steak of our holiday so we...should have gone back
The service you get here is second to none the waiters are trained to attend you every need and the chef/owner always comes out to ask that everything is OK it is a truly enjoyable experience 
Would I go again ? 100% Yes 
JohnMore

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: We started with the watermelon and feta salad which was an unexpected pleasant combination. The filet steak was cooked perfectly with a warm pepper sauce and sautéed veg. Finished with butterscotch brûlée. Beer and cocktails for two under £50 represents great value for money. If...I was longer in Goa I would eat here againMore

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Thank you for a wonderful Christmas dinner! The chef visited our table twice and catered to our wishes that weren’t directly on the menu (pig’s in blankets for starters and a cheese board). The waiters were also very friendly and accommodating. Nice ambiance and very...tasty food. Do visit if you want something different to what the beach shacks have to offer.More

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: We stumbled across this restaurant whilst trying to find a nice place to enjoy a traditional European Christmas dinner whilst on holiday in Goa. Luckily we did because the staff here were absolutely incredible, the food was amazing and the chef personality visited our table...twice to check up on how our meal was going. We had two food requests which were not on the menu and both were accommodated with no issues whatsoever. If you like good food, you shouldn’t miss the opportunity to visit this restaurant! The service was also incredible. Thanks for a wonderful experience!More

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Well worth booking a table for a special treat
The restaurant, Chef Soumyen and his staff were welcoming and were noted ‘Top Notch’ The menu covered everything – YES we were really spoilt. Sat with cool drinks deciding our choice. Tiger prawns were my choice...– 5 filled the plate
TM had a steak(a melt in your mouth standard steak(WOW))mushroom sauce, chips and onion rings – thought was a perfect meal – could we get that same standard back here in Yorkshire(2night??)  Ha!!
Spoilt for choice for sweets YES but we DID
All in all a really great dining Xperience – NOT THE CHEAPEST  but well worth that special treat and I’m sure we will return again on our next Goa visitMore

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Quote: Spoil yourself and try it soon
Detail Review:
We'd booked a table a couple of nights in advance via Facebook but like many places it was relatively quiet, although it filled up to perhaps 40% full.

The service and ambience are top notch and this is a 'silver service' experience. Starters were battered...chillies and rum/lemin prawns. We both had fillet steaks, one with a trio of pepper sauce and one with red wine with pate sauce. Both were beautiful pieces of meat and cooked expertly.

Deserts were to die for (creme brulee and bread & butter pudding). Brandy coffee to finish, total bill INR4100  with drinks. Nit the cheapest but as an experience worth every rupee.

Give it a try soon.More

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Was recommended this restaurant by our TUI tour guide Amar. Lovely decor from the outside with such a calm and chilled environment. 

We were greeted by the chefs son with a smile and choose to sit outside. 

Variety of the menu was vast and we...were confused on what to order (as we wanted it all). However after speak to chef Soumen about what we liked he advised us what he thought was best for us. His choices were spot on!! We ordered prawn and squid chilli fry along with with peri chips and mushrooms. The food was amazing!! Our mains included Goan fish curry, goan prawn curry and chicken in sautéed gravy… honestly the food was outstanding. 

Chef kept us informed about how long our food would take and even given gave us a free desert which was so lovely of him!! He even told us the best way to drink Feni. 

Honestly the best place for food and our first visit to goa at such an amazing restaurant has left us wanting more (we will have to make a visit there before we leave)!!More

Name: CHEF SOUMYEN'S KITCHEN, Calangute - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Quote: Chocolate Mousse is to die for!
Detail Review: A lovely environment to enjoy a quality dinner. The menu is varied and inclusive and the service is outstanding. Of all the fine dinning we have experienced in Goa this place is my favourite. Highly recommend the chocolate mousse.

Name: KOCHI KITCHEN, Kochi (Cochin) - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: We recently dined at the restaurant and it was outstanding. The food was so yummy and the ambiance was pretty nice and the service was impeccable. Highly recommend..

Name: KOCHI KITCHEN, Kochi (Cochin) - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: The buffet spread was wonderful and the desserts were especially delicious. Keep up the standard and the food was amazing too.

Name: KOCHI KITCHEN, Kochi (Cochin) - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Food was delicious and the service was  high standard we were very much satisfied with the food and service Overall it was amazing.More

Name: KOCHI KITCHEN, Kochi (Cochin) - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Loved the place ! great authentic food we had, staff is super attentive as well they always made us feel like a family.More

Name: KOCHI KITCHEN, Kochi (Cochin) - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Quote: A birthday dinner on a random Wednesday turned excellent dining!
Detail Review: Celebrated my dad's 60th birthday with an amazing spread for dinner here. The sous chef here runs an amazing kitchen! The food was *mwah* just wow, starters, salads, multi cuisine main courses, a cheese spread? And my dad had 5 plates of food haha! The...servers absolutely polite (amropali was a delight) and the floor manager was a great help and overall felt just taken care of!More

Name: KOCHI KITCHEN, Kochi (Cochin) - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Food was excellent many options were there in the buffet. Special thanks to the chef and friendly staff Mr Fiveboy and others.More

Name: KOCHI KITCHEN, Kochi (Cochin) - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
He food was delicious...Great food options. Excellent ambience. 
Enjoyed our dinner thoroughly. Lovely spread...More

Name: KOCHI KITCHEN, Kochi (Cochin) - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Great atmosphere and great service... Friendly staffs. Food here was good and a wide variety of International Cuisine made it the best..More

Name: KOCHI KITCHEN, Kochi (Cochin) - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Abhishek, Akash from the F&B Banquet team were amazing. Their attention to detail and their willingness to help us were extraordinary. On behalf of TTT 2023, I am truly grateful to these gentleman and their team.

Tanveer HasanMore

Name: KOCHI KITCHEN, Kochi (Cochin) - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Great food and exceptional service...Special mention to Mr.Sivaprasad and Mr Manjul who were very prompt and catered to all our needs .Can't say enough abt the service it was that amazingMore

Name: KOCHI KITCHEN, Kochi (Cochin) - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Excellent customer service of Achu, Fiveboy and the manager. Making sure we enjoyed our food and offered other options.More

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Awesome food, beautiful view and friendly staff. Pundlik Thank you for your kind hospitality. Everything we ate was awesome. Seafood, chicken, tandoori items, traditional and continental preparation both were good. Even sandwich was good and enjoyed hot chocolate while watching beautiful sunset.

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Really marvelous location,excellent stay delicious seafood,very tasty and very honest,friendly  staff and cooperative

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: The only one place in arambol perfect  location very close to the beach  which nice seaview food is very tasty every day fresh seafood delicious taste ever had in my life..More

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Excellent stay,food,schef delicious seafood,and good staff and service..all in all wonderful stay and good food so please when you walking to arambol beach you have visit one time..More

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Had breakfast, very good, cheap, centrally located and near the action (way back in 2010) Menu in various languages, plus a very friendly dog joined me and was looked after by cafe (the fattest dog I saw on my whole trip)

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Breakfast here was lovely with good portions and varieties , loved the pancakes  especially the coconut pancakes... view is excellent being directly on the beach , the staff are good ...

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Most frequented place in arambom for me
Detail Review: I really come to this place all the time. Can't think of a shack I have visited more times than this. Lemonana is a must try drink here. They do a decent job at cooking most other food too.

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Good location with good food. Good place for dinner. Visiting this place for several years. Paneer Tiranga is delicious.

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Nice food and good people, good place to chill on the beach, 
Food was very good and the staff work there are really friendly

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Good food, wide variety menu, friendly service, good VFM
Detail Review:
Over the years I've eaten here on countless occasions. The food is always good, although rarely spectacular.

The service is always good, and the waiters are personable.

Great location set on the beach.

As good a place as any to have a meal any time...of the day or night.More

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
21 Coconut were the best in terms of hospitality and food. Their Fish platter is the best do try it.
Also the chicken and beef were well roasted. Do try the beef fry/roast there it is awesome. Staff has been exemplary . The rooms were...clean and spacious enough.More

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
During our time in Arambol we ate here almost everyday. The food was lovely and we couldn't fault it. Being a bit wary during our stay in India as a whole we were a bit worried about eating meat. 
But we both had the Chicken...Tikka and Tandoori chicken. And it was the best chicken throughout our whole trip. The food was just lovely. And they do great pasta dishes too.
The waiters were really nice and you can see they work very hard!

Thank you 21 Coconuts inn.More

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Excellent service, perfect views and our dish was extra spicy as requested. Nice relaxing place to be.

Name: 21 COCONUTS INN RESTURANT, Arambol - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Increadiblly delicious fish!! Super nice location and very kind, profesional and helpfool staff! Thank you <3

Name: LA CASA, Bengaluru - Jayanagar 4 Blk - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: This restaurant is located near Jaynagar shopping complex with decent ambience, nice place for draught beer, food and starters are very costly, service is ok.

Name: LA CASA, Bengaluru - Jayanagar 4 Blk - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: It is a great pace to chat with your friends over a few mugs of beer.With lots of greenery around the place looks very cosy.The service is prompt and courteous.

Name: LA CASA, Bengaluru - Jayanagar 4 Blk - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Good Seating, nice retro music with some random hard rock.Good Food and good draught beer.Service is nice and fast. Ambience is relaxed and good for a group conversation. Recommended for Music, food and beer.Nice and quiet

Name: LA CASA, Bengaluru - Jayanagar 4 Blk - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Quote: Good food but eerie smoky ambience
Detail Review:
We’ve been here several times in the past, and yesterday’s visit for dinner was after a long hiatus. As always, we enjoyed the Mexican veg burger. This time though, deviating from the routine, one of my sons also ordered the veg lasagna. It didn’t disappoint...at all. In fact, it was quite delicious. We also had some roasted peanut masala, in which I found some peanuts were overdone. 
The only two drawbacks of this place according to me are the dim lights (some people prefer this) and the smoky atmosphere in the ground floor, which makes me hold my breath while walking through to go upstairs.More

Name: LA CASA, Bengaluru - Jayanagar 4 Blk - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Quote: Great location but disappointing food and service
Detail Review: Everyone around this area refers you to La Casa if you want have nice draught beer. Well it does serve that and is located prominently. But the food and service is a far cry. Name: LA CASA, Bengaluru - Jayanagar 4 Blk - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Quote: La Casa - a great restaurant with old world charm!
Detail Review:
The La Casa, situated in Jayanagar 4th block, is an amazing restaurant that caters and appeals to the young and the old generations!

I have been a patron of this restaurant from my college days up till now and I continue to enjoy the charm...and hospitality of the staff and management. It all started during college days when we, a bunch of friends, used to bunk classes and walk down to the restaurant for some great beer and tasty bites.
Now, married and with family, I still continue to come here and my wife and kid too have become a great fan of this quint old place!

The food is quite good with both Indian and European dishes - the remarkable dish being the Sicilian pizzas!
The wrought beer served here is just fresh and amazing and that is one of the main reason that I continue to patronize this restaurant.

A great place to hangover with friends or for a family get together!More

Name: LA CASA, Bengaluru - Jayanagar 4 Blk - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor

Name: LA CASA, Bengaluru - Jayanagar 4 Blk - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor

Quote: Just the BEST ... Good Food and Nice service
Detail Review:
A very nice place in the middle of the city to have a lavish dinner on my anniversary day. We enjoyed the food and the hospitality. Very good service and very good food. Generous and professional people, we forgot our smartphone in the lobby after...our dinner and went back home. Next morning after searching everywhere, I called the hotel to inquire about it. They said they have received a phone and you can come to claim it with proper ID proof. We were really happy to get it back. They noted our details and gave us the phone. I was truly thinking about the honesty of that guy who must have handed over the smartphone to the reception desk. A big thanks to Shree Maya and their staff.
Coming to the food, delicious to the core. Special mention required for the veg kothe, Paneer pasanda and the lachcha parathas. Superbb food. I m waiting to go again when I go Indore next time.More

Name: RESTAURANT SHREEMAYA, Indore - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options
Quote: A restaurant we visited twice in a day.
Detail Review:
We landed at Indore and asked our driver to take us to a good restaurant for lunch before checking in our destined hotel as we wanted to see some good eating place in Indore on the Airport to the town route. Our driver took us...to the Shrimaya Hotel where we found one restaurant, but the problem was to get a table there as we were told to wait for 1 hour. My wife requested the Manager to allow us food while standing because we had to leave early. The Manager was so courteous that not only he allowed us to have lunch but also provided a chair for my wife and he took full care of us. The taste of food was beyond explanation and we could not believe that such a good food could be provided in Indore. This was a buffet system and the varieties were many more than required. Every dish was competing with the other. We enjoyed food for about 45 minutes and then thanked the Manager and the other waiters and left. 
In the evening we were in a group of 10 people and again went there for dinner. This time we chose Ala Carte and waited for about 1 hour. All of us enjoyed the food of our choice and were taken care of well by the staffs there.
So this was a day when we visited a restaurant twice in a day and enjoyed both the events. Thanks to the Manager and the staffs there.More

Name: TYGR, Mumbai - Lower Parel - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Fine dine at Modern Thai Bar & Grill, Tygr
Detail Review:
TYGR, a modern Thai bar & grill, marks yet another star from the house of Massive Restaurants Pvt. Ltd

The concept is focused to bring the finest ingredients flown in from Thailand and exborant cocktail menu inspired with Thai ingredients are a highlight here.

The...place has high energy, interiors are expectedly classy. The ingredients speaks of freshness, coupled with Spot-on taste as well as presentation. 

Chicken Dimsums with Thai - Chilli Oil is something good to start with. Wok tossed chicken is a good option if you like stir fried type of chicken. 

Vegetarians or Non-vegetarians - you shouldn't miss Roti Canai !! It's a Roti with Avacado & Curried Pepper Mayo. Satay Alam is their version of Chicken Satay, served with steamed bao's. 

They Appetisers section is perfect to appease any of the palate. The menu has influence of another cuisine - American braisserie as well, they are perfectly corporated in the menu. I still need to explore that part, and look forward to try in my nect visit. 

The main course ordered were humble Red Thai Curry and Jaismine Rice. But fret not, our focus was all on the desserts. We didn't left without trying the coveted Mango Pudding with sticky Rice. And the last thing we have tried is Triple Layered Semi Fredo , Katafi & Gritty Milk.More

* Corn cake Sliders - 10/10

* Charcoal charred vegetable bundles...- 9/10
This is a first with charcoal, loved the dish

* Tempura cake - 9/10
The tempura cake here is something different, give it a try

* Jasmine rice with green Thai curry - 9/10
That green Thai curry is love 

* Chocolate truffle - 9.5/10
Very very rich in preparation

The place is predominantly based on Thai cuisine with their version of world cuisines moulded into Thai flavors. 

With the kalra brands you always expect something different and innovative. This place didn't disappoint either. Loved the overall experience.

The food, service and ambience are all on point. 

You can visit with family, friends, business colleagues alike.More

Name: TYGR, Mumbai - Lower Parel - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Best Thai Food Restaurant in Mumbai
Detail Review:
The brand new menu at @tygrofficial ensuring I fall in love with THAI FOOD! Most dishes I tried from their new menu (drinks included) were brain frazzingly GOOD! The red snapper with chilli jaggery and lime was so so good! Tons of flavours! Fish cooked...really well - the sweetness of jaggery blending perfectly well with the hotness of chilli and tanginess of lime! #MUSTORDER 
.
.
The wok tossed chicken -  BRILLIANT! A simple, elegant dish that you’d want to order again! #REPEATORDER 
.
.
.
The authentic and classic Thai meal that comprised Pad Thai Vermicelli Noodles, Thai Green Curry with Steamed Jasmine Rice and Stir Fried Veggies ans Yellow Beans made for a perfect weekday dinner meal (also healthy!!) Ended with a classic Tiramisu & the Triple Layered Fredo served with Katafi won my heart! The Mousse was outstanding! Also, the mixologist has done such a fab job! Refreshing, innovative drinks served in really creative manner!

Ika Rings, Flamed Coconut, Yam Dressing: Crispy and Crunchy! Not a fab of squids but this tasted like crunchy lotus steams! So good! 

If you're a cocktail lover a must try would be "The way of the duck"! It's comes with a brilliant presentation and taste wise is a tropical HIT! If you're a Mocktail lover like me please definitely go for mango and kafir lime mocktail! So refreshing! 
.
.
.
What’s not to like? #TYGR #LovedTheExperience 
.
.
.

Name: TYGR, Mumbai - Lower Parel - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor

Name: TYGR, Mumbai - Lower Parel - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: New Menu At TYGR is amazing
Detail Review:
Long ago, people would remember their traveling days for different delicacies and cuisines, but now they can discuss it in their social gatherings. With cultural influence and access to new ingredients, everything can is custom made ss per the taste and preference. Giving innovative thoughts...to Mumbaikar’s appetite, Zorawar Kalra, owner of Massive Restaurant’s, built TYGR for the tantalizing palate as well as for voracious eaters.

 

TYGR looks debonair in the elegant Palladium Mall (Lower Parel) and is an adobe for Thai cuisines & American food. The word TYGR denotes “roar of a tiger” and manifest an all-day-dining restaurant. The semicircle bar lit up in hue of golden is captivating and inevitable with a large display of drinks. As you move in the palatial realm, there are different forms of tiger prints across the walls with Goldfish motifs for prosperity and good luck. Rattan chairs, Thai bamboo sticks, and Japanese chandelier best describe the physical appearance of TYGR.

 

TYGR is quite for lunches in the afternoon, fun for drinks in the evening, and by night it turns into a full night club for special gatherings and parties. Everything inside the lounge-like setting is to relieve your stress and reinvigorate into a new start.

 

While Thai cuisines dominate the menu, TYGR also offers American grills and Japanese cuisines too. The mouth-watering and flavorsome dishes are worth every bite. The Parched Chicken Miang Kham is full of fresh ingredients and fun to eat with Michigan plums and raw mango. Ika Rings (deep-fried squids) is crisp and topped with flamed coconut & yam dressing. The Fennel Tiger Prawns taste juicy and meaty with tender prawns doing the magic. Roti Canai, one of the staff’s recommendations, is dressed up in avocado and multiple curried pepper mayo. For mains, there is Wok Tossed Chicken rice with fried chilies and cashew accompanied with Tofu curry truncated with soft roasted peanuts.

 

Triple-Layered Semi Fredo with Katafi & Gritty Milk dessert is dense and mouthful. It will just be a great ending to your meal journey.

 

TYGR recreates a food scene that is simple and uncomplicated. With Thai and American cuisines circling the tables, this place is bound to please one and all. So be it lunch or party, there is something for everyone.

 

 More

Detail Review:
Jodhpur is excellent during monsoons. Umaid Bhawan Palace and Mehrangarh Fort is a must see if you visit Jodhpur. The glorious history of the Royal Rajputs is extremely fascinating for me and every time I visit Rajasthan I am mesmerised. 

The Osian desert safari was...expensive and Sam Sand dunes is the real thing! but we met this 12 year old boy Sanjay who took amazing pictures with our cell phone. He aspires to be a photographer and I would encourage everyone who visits Osian to try him out. He ws really the star for me..not the safari.More

Name: MCDONALD'S, Muzaffarnagar - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
This is one of the most convenient places to stop for a break near Muzaffarnagar. While the rest of Namaste Midway has been renovated and most of the earlier brands moved out of here, McDonald’s is still there. I had last visited this McDonald’s a...couple of years ago, on a very crowded and busy day, so my memories of it are a little hazy, but I think this has been refurbished too, at least somewhat: the furniture etc looked all new and shiny.

The food is the usual predictable McDonald’s fare, not gourmet, not even good for you, but dependable. I had a filet-o-fish burger (would have liked more tartar sauce on that) and a bag of fries (I don’t patronize McDonald’s usually, so hadn’t realized they’re introduced peri-peri fries: the plain salted fries come with a sachet of peri-peri spice powder and a paper bag in which you tip the fries and the spice mix, shake them up well—and your peri-peri fries are ready. I don’t like much spice, so these weren’t a hit with me, but I can imagine that most spice-loving Indians would welcome these. 

I also had an iced tea (nice) and a chocolate brownie soft serve. The latter, a serve of vanilla ice cream with a tiny walnut brownie stuck on top and a drizzle of chocolate sauce, was surprisingly nice: much better than I’d expected.More

Well done Sammy.More

Name: HAVELI, Murthal - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Since I live in Haryana (Sonipat), Haveli has always been my “Go-To” place for authentic menu, superb ambiance, peaceful aura and unmatched service.

We visited the place today to celebrate my Daughter’s Top Score (9.8CGPA) in her graduation. Being a Sunday, there was a waiting...period of about 15 minutes. The Staff, as polite & as courteous as they always are, got us a table within 5 minutes. 

We dined to our heart’s content & concluded our meals with delectable Jalebi & Adrak Wali Chai. Our Server, Mr. Nadeem was extremely well-behaved, well-spoken and guided us with ordering just the perfect family lunch. Mr. Pramod Sharma also served well.

Thank You Haveli (Murthal) for yet another memorable experience.

Love,
Nanak.More

Name: HAVELI, Murthal - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Really good food and good service, but food prices are too high. If you are really rich and willing to waste your money then it's a great place for you. Near future, I won't go to this place until n unless it's the only option.More

Name: HAVELI, Murthal - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Quote: Best Restaurant at Murthal for highway travellers on Chandigarh/ Shimla highway
Detail Review: While going to Chandigarh, I tried this restaurant/ Dhaba at Murthal. I was with my relative from USA. The Haveli here is not constructed as Karnal Haveli or Jalandhar Haveli is designed in village format. It appears to be a modern Haveli. The interiors, the...sitting plan, the ambiance and the hospitability here is very good compared to other popular restaurants/ dhabas in Murthal. We ordered the Combo having Mix Parantha, Dal, Dahi, Lassi & Butter (special price) and Tea. The food quality was very good and it was served in time. One can have lots of pictures inside and outside. The bonus is Driver tea and snacks are free of cost. A must visit place for Delhites on weekends.More

Name: HAVELI, Murthal - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
