Name: GRILL BY THE OCEAN - RIVATAS HOTEL, Varanasi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: The food was surprisingly very tasty. With comfortable prices and a wide choice, we easily had a great dinner. Fish can be avoided here as it was river catch. All cuisines were there to choose from. We went for soup and the indian Daal and...vegetables which were well prepared and not spicy or over cooked.More

Name: GRILL BY THE OCEAN - RIVATAS HOTEL, Varanasi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Very convenient and peaceful location on Cantonment main road. The front office staff is very hospitable.The ambience is very cozy and peaceful. The management is highly responsive to customers complaints and calls.
  The lobby area has weak lighting which does not give a lively impression....The buffet breakfast needs a variety lift. The kitchen staff needs more interaction with customers to improve deliverable quality.More

Name: GRILL BY THE OCEAN - RIVATAS HOTEL, Varanasi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
After a day of the noisy, crowded streets of Varanasi and feeling that you have been harangued by street venders and auto drivers, you need a tranquil getaway to survive. This is a great place to stay.
It is luxury accommodation. The rooms are actually...a suite, with a separate lounge and dining area. The bed was huge and Very comfortable. Everything was clean and fresh smelling. The bed linen was actually white and not grey, like so many hotels here.
The rainforest shower in the large bathroom was a treat.
Buffet or a'lacarte in the restaurant is very reasonably priced for such luxury accommodation. The service is great and the food : Simply Delicious.
All in all, a great place to stay.More

Name: GRILL BY THE OCEAN - RIVATAS HOTEL, Varanasi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
They are trying to copy from bar b q nation but failed. 
The grill they put in the table didn't have heat at all, there was no taste in kababs when we asked to put more flavor to it they just put red chilli powder...on top of kababs after that it was impossible to eat.

When we asked why the food don't have any flavor, they reply that it made according to taste of foreigner. I know places which serves authentic Indian food with Indian spices and foreigners love it but this place is a dull. The only people you see in this restaurant are first timer or who have taken yearly membership of the restaurant.

Food 0/5
Ambiance 3/5
Service 2/5More

Name: PHILEAS HOGG, Bengaluru - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: This restaurant has an entrance that could do better. And the lifts are very slow. I think these 2 reasons make it not so well known in Marthahalli itself. This is not upscale so its easy on the pocket and even alcohol was not expensive. I would definitely recommend this to people and would like myself to visit it again!!!!More

Name: PHILEAS HOGG, Bengaluru - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: 2 glasses of tap beer for Rs. 100. and great food from cuisines around the world. we ordered fish-n-chips, chicken a-la-Kiev and grilled fish. all of them tasted great.

Name: PHILEAS HOGG, Bengaluru - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Easy on pocket, high on taste buds
Detail Review: This is kind of a resturant that would be appreciated by foodies.Situated on the noisy street of marathali and munekolal service road right above purple haze pub. Being the roof top resturant without open terrace and a ceiling fan to drench your thrust for cool...breeze during summers is definitely not gonna impress your date. But if you are in a mood for a light drink , awesome food and lot of noise to make with your frends then this is the one. One of the best pesto I have had is the creation of this resturant. In short this place is to entertain your taste buds.Suggestion for dishes are Pasta(white), zaffrani chicken, fish and chipsMore

Name: PHILEAS HOGG, Bengaluru - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
With so many eating options in and around here, you will almost surely miss this restaurant. That is the reason, it is perfectly occupied even on weekends. We did not find a huge crowd waiting in queues to get in as in most other places....The place is nice although slightly hot with ceiling fans blowing above our heads.

However, the specialty of the place is that they offer the best of the breed, Continental, Indian, Chinese, Afghani, you name it and you have a few items of every cuisine. What is even better is that like most other similar places which claim to be multi cuisine, they don't loose the plot midway. I tried Indian in terms of Zaffrani Chicken. Continental in terms of Fish with chips, Italian Pasta and their popular Shepherd's Pie. All of them tasted quite awesome. The quantity were adequate and the service was decent if not super quick (We didn't mind as we all wanted some time)

The only disturbing element was the loud noise of music that came from the Purple Haze pub below. Also sometimes the heat was telling. Another thing is that the elevator and the stairway leading to the place are cramped. But for the price and the quality, I would surely visit it again...More

Name: PHILEAS HOGG, Bengaluru - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: This one probably one of the lesser know resturant in bangalore. I liked their concept of serving the best dishes around the world. I went 2-3 times in the last year. I always enjoyed their dishes but had a very mixed reaction from my friends....I never tried their their indian dishes but loved japanese , thai and chiense ones. Oneof my friend order American and I felt that is a waste of money.. anyway choice is personal. I always liked this resturant. Little chaotic about their place arrangement but if you are good with you choice of food you will like itMore

Name: KAKAJI SATVIK RESTAURANT, Shirdi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor

Name: KAKAJI SATVIK RESTAURANT, Shirdi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: New cheating tricks . . Five star rates in a below average hotel . .
Detail Review:
Don't get fooled by so many positive  reviews for this restaurant. . I went to this resturant after reading so many positive feedbacks . . 
Inspite of so many positive reviews , no one knew about this resturant even the shop keepers in the next...building were not familiar with resturant.
However , I reached the resturant , which is in Hotel Vir Sai near Sai baba temple. 
The resturant was empty. We asked for the menu card but the waiter told us that they do not have one. He told us some dishes verbally and quoted rates which sounded reasonable. 
We ordered just one vegetable , two roti , one dal and one plane rice . . 
To our shock , he told me that I need to pay Rs. 725/-. I was still in shock as this hotel is not even a One star property. I still asked him for a printed bill so the waiter said the printer is not working. He asked us to make the payment at the reception counter.
The shock continues . . The reception staff some Mr Vijay asked me to pay Rs 810/- saying that the waiter was wrong in calculating the bill. . 
Can you believe this , the trick is they will not show you any menu card and then ask for any amount as they wish and not give you any bill as well. . 
After I put my foot down , saying that I must get a bill , they some how produced a fake bill with no registration number and no tax , printed on a letter head . . 
The food was below average and the price was almost a five star . . 
Please avoid such cheat business establishments . . 
I am considering filing a proper complaint against this resturant so that they can not cheat tourist in future . .More

Name: KAKAJI SATVIK RESTAURANT, Shirdi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor

Name: MAMA'S RASOI, Pathankot - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: The most atrocious service in a otherwise nice property
Detail Review:
The place lies bang on highway, adequate parking, nice views, small rides for kids, outdoor seating. These are the natural plus points for which we chose it for our family dinner (6 adults+ 2 kids).
 
The service was a huge let down. 
- Lemon coriander...soup had to be cancelled as coriander had FINISHED. That was informed 20 min after the order. 
-  A fresh lime soda took so long that I cancelled it. 
-  The food was just left on table by the waiter(no serving) especially when the table area made it difficult to pass the utensils amongst ourselves. 
- In the second half reordered the fresh lime with two other mocktails. The contents were all wrong. On enquiry neither the bartender nor the restaurant manager turned up, despite waiting for additional 45 minutes. ( they did not charge for the wrong mix though- but that still made my daughter miss the drink she wanted with her food) 

Summary. 
1.pathetic service and ' don't give a dime' attitude of staff, manager. 
2. Food quality was average. 
3. No feedback system by the management. 
4. More waiters than total guests in the whole area but no one is waiting at the tables. They were chit chatting in groups watching the agony of the customers. 

It could be a once in a while thing at the place but it spoiled our special day.More

Name: MAMA'S RASOI, Pathankot - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Never to visit. I would rate it zero stars.
Detail Review:
We stopped by this place on our back from Dalhaousi and service/food was just Horrible.

RESTROOMS: We stopped looking at the resturant from outside. It looked super nice and contemporary. We thought food will be nice and restrooms will be clean but restrooms were more...dirty than one can imagine. After we complaint to the manager... he quickly appologized and told us that we can use a different restroom on the backside. 
Its so frustrating that you will make your guest goes through such bad experience and only if one raises his/her voice...you provide another option. They lied on top saying that the dirty restroom is closed when there was no such sign and lots of their staff were just standing there never told anyone. 
I saw so many kids, mothers, older people struggling to use bathroom and staff like myself with no choice when on road trip.

FOOD: We ordered Chinese food for kids and told them specifically the spice level to be #1. The food came cooked with red and black peppers. It was just too spicy for kids to eat. The chicken used was old and very hard chew making it inedible. 
On our complaint- They did remake one of the dish for the kids but it came too late. They also took one dish of the charge as well. 

Overall service was very poor. They made this fancy looking hotel/ resturant to impress guest from all over the place but dont have any sercice quality. I regret to go by looks and stop at this place.More

Name: RENDEZ-VOUS BAR & RESTURANT, Manali - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Its a nice place to relax and enjoy beaut of Manali....
Detail Review:

I have been to this place 2-3 times, and have always preferred to sit outside, the ambiance is cheerful , yet relaxing. they offer seating with chair and...tables as well as elevated sitting , so one can sit with legs relaxed and enjoy their cup of tea/coffee.

The food here is quite good as well, I did enjoy a bowl of white pasta, and sandwich here, with a later come back and a cup of cappuccino. Everything was served well and hot. But the service her is quite slow, or maybe it was off season they were short staffed, and took good deal of time to serve, but the taste and preparation wasn't compromised at all, I must acknowledge the same as well.
The prices here were a at par with same the class of places in the region and overall, One should visit here and enjoy the beauty of Manali.
Cheers ;)

Name: THE SAHIB ROOM & KIPLING BAR, Mumbai - Lower Parel - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Halal, Gluten Free Options
Quote: One of the finest in Mumbai for Awadhi food!
Detail Review: The Sahib Room & Kipling Bar is one gem of an Indian restaurant at the beautiful St Regis, Mumbai. The dining rooms boasts of amazing views at night, it’s elegantly decorated in colonial style with a bunch of artefacts kept everywhere around and delivers a...truly “Sahib” experience. Their newly appointed Chef Taj has done a wonderful job in reprising the menu which was already perfect. The Sahib room does justice to The Awadhi Cuisine in every possible way. The food is extremely well balanced, so aromatic that it’s tempting from a distance and has the characteristic of Gilawat in most of the dishes (minimal effort required in chewing). The best way to sample kebabs is to opt for the Sampling Platter. Loved all of them, super tender. Star was obviously the Gilawat kebab, probably the best I ever had after ITC’s Kakori (Sorry the Dum Pukth’s version is still unbeatable). Next we ordered the Sahib ki Nihari and Sahib ki Dal e Khaas which were definitely the best renditions I ever tasted. The balance of flavours was impeccable. Even the breads were fantastic. Have to try the Biryani next time. Coming to the service, everyone took good care of the table, it was non-intrusive. Have to especially give a shoutout to Chef Taj for customising some things and taking the time out to have interesting conversations about food with me and my dad (was celebrating my Dad’s bday). The team did everything and more to make our celebration memorable. My dad absolutely loved the food and was already making plans to return for a meal. The restaurant is soon going to get renovated and I feel super lucky to have experienced what the original Sahib  Room had to offer. The newer establishment will be opened by Chef Taj only, have higher expectations. What a fantastic meal it was tho, highly recommending everyone to catch a meal at The Sahib Room. Probably one of the most refined Awadhi restaurant Mumbai’s got. Period.More

Name: THE SAHIB ROOM & KIPLING BAR, Mumbai - Lower Parel - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor

Name: THE SAHIB ROOM & KIPLING BAR, Mumbai - Lower Parel - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Halal, Gluten Free Options
Quote: Dont go- it is not St Regis experience. You will be happier with food and service at a street vendor
Detail Review:
What a shame and let down this visit has been. This used to be by far my favorite. However, the food and service both were a huge let down.

Restaurant looked understaffed, and whatever staff was there seemed untrained in working in a place like...St Regis (St Regis, I believe is the top brand of Marriott and known for impeccable service).

Restaurant manager Mr Bhagwan didnt really care for service. No server was assigned to our table and whenever we needed anything, we had to catch hold of someone passing by and ask for it.

We asked for still water and got served sparkling water. We asked for green salad and the chef gave us sliced cucumbers, sliced carrots and sliced tomatoes- I am sure a street vendor would have done a better job. 

Chef recommended that we have bundi raita. we placed the order and he came back and said that he has run out of bundi!! Can you even believe this?

Overall a total waste of money and time and a beautiful evening.More

Name: THE SAHIB ROOM & KIPLING BAR, Mumbai - Lower Parel - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor

Name: THE EATERS, New Delhi - Greater Kailash I - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Launch of American Style Resturant In Delhi “The Eaters”
Detail Review:
Recently I have been to the newly opened Resturant in GK South Delhi which is specialized in American food. As we all love junk food and western culture even when we know we have to do more exercise today in the gym just because of...extra calories we had in our lunch, dinner or evening snacks. But who cares as long as its a matter of food because at the end of the day when we all gonna die it’s only food which is going with us not our money, value, fashion or extra push up in gyms.

So let me tell you all about this restaurant who are really good in taste, flavor, variety, serving etc. the best part of the restaurant is that they are really hygiene and they serve in Glass utensil.

First Of All, I would like to share their Menu Card in which all the variety and prices are mentioned.

I started with my all-time favorite burgers and at “The Eaters” they call it “The Spartan Sliders (Basically slides of 3 small burgers that too available in different colors like Green, Pink Black Purple Etc.)

They were tasty but very different in taste like Indian Burgers but anyways I will give this item 3.5/5 start rating.

The Trumps Price-239/- I had a drink Uptown Funk with Orange Slice Inside the drink I loved it a lot. Inside this drink, you will find some jelly cubes which were fantastic in the mouth.

I tried Glocko Pop Lemonade which was watermelon Drink really refreshing. and best drink for summers.

How can I forget Best French Fries I ever Had in a Bowl full of Cheese my love. I never like french fries of any place even the one I had in China was waste of money for but this place definitely had great taste I french fries.

The sandwich is great love especially when its full of cheese and taste so here we go with an amazing open sandwich which looks great and taste well.

First time in my life I loved Salad because it looks tasty and full of cheese and tasty stuff inside a bowl I call it Happiness in a bowl.

Hygiene- Its a matter of fact that if we are eating outside there should be hygiene because it directly affects our health. as their kitchen is in front you can see how it has been done.

Serving Method- They will serve you every liquid, salad in a beautiful glass jar even when you will order for home delivery they will serve you in the same kind of transparent glass jar through which you can see and feel what exactly inside t.

Food Quality- Amazing everything I tasted was having something great inside and which was making this restaurant food completely different and of course American.

Price- As per as the price concern is also not so high if we compare the quality and service they are providing to their customer.

Location- As we all know that south Delhi is already a very good and nice area of Delhi so we cant complaint about the location as its situated in GK 1 M Block Market.

Address- M-73, Shop 2, Greater Kailash-2, M Block Market, Block M, Greater Kailash II, Greater Kailash, New Delhi, Delhi 110048

Open Hours- 10:00 am to 11:00 pm

Phone: 011 4010 5459

Home Delivery – Yes

Below is the Menu Card of the Resturant You can Check even before the visit and decide in advance what to eat and what to not.More

Nice place to take a break from a long journey to Akkalot.
Local food and dishes available and patient taste. 
Nice and clean place with local knowledgeable staff.
Clean premises , ample parking space.
Different sit outs available, like garden, banquette and normal table and...chairs.More

Name: WALSANG WADA RESTURANT, Solapur - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Quote: Good pitstop on solapur - akkalkot road
Detail Review: This is a good place for family breakfast/lunch stop. Food is good, prices are reasonable and ambience is village styled. We tried shenga poli which was very authentic and laden with pure ghee. Ample trees and shades around the restaurant to relax post food.

Name: WALSANG WADA RESTURANT, Solapur - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Its well known for its Maharashtrian food items, but punjabi food is also good. It has good theme. Family friendly hotel. Must visit if you are traveling on solapur akkalkot road. During rush time, service may be slow.

Name: WALSANG WADA RESTURANT, Solapur - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Quote: Great food on solapur akkalkot highway
Detail Review: Good food, great service & nice place to hangout on highway. I had breakfast n dinner both were nice.

Name: WALSANG WADA RESTURANT, Solapur - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: We had requested our rental car driver to stop at a place for lunch in Solapur on our way to Akkalkot. Although it was an hour before we could stop, we were pleasantly surprised with his pick of Valsang wada for lunch as it is...almost an hour away from Solapur. This place is off of state highway (pretty poor road conditions!), has an ambience of village setting and open concept. Food is prepared after you have placed an order and so it does take some time. The service is excellent. We ordered chapattis, moong pend pala, methi lasun and dahi. All the food was very tatsy and the spice levels are a bit on high (here comes Dahi!). They also use credit card for payments. In all, it is a good place for lunch stopover. My only gripe was a certain odor was present in the area which probably was due to improper disposal of food waste. If they can take care on the odor, this is nice place to spend some time especially if you have young kids as they can run around. will go back if I am in the area again just to see if there is any improvement and check out the tasty food.More

Name: WALSANG WADA RESTURANT, Solapur - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Good Hotel for road side trip. Moderate price, delicious food. Service is bit slow but hospitality is good. Taste the traditional junka/ bhakri. It's yummy

Name: WALSANG WADA RESTURANT, Solapur - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: i has very good maharashtra cuisine, n can be happy if we consider the quality as compared to price..nice ambiance..

Name: WALSANG WADA RESTURANT, Solapur - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: The dishes are traditional marathi and also punjabi cuisine. They are prepared fresh. The restaurant has great open ambience and we can seat on ground. Advisable to visit in large groups. Kids can run around and have fun.

Name: WALSANG WADA RESTURANT, Solapur - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: This restaurant provides good and fresh food.. The service is good.the premises are clean...Waiters are polite.... A Budget restuarent I can mention...

Name: WALSANG WADA RESTURANT, Solapur - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: We had dinner at this place on the occasion of my friends silver wedding anniversary. Purely vegetarian restaurant, clean spacious ample parking good food. We had onion & chilli pakodas followed by veg. manchurian jeera rice with dal fry and veg khorma with chapatis &...bakhris. Nice place to have simple veg. food.More

Name: WALSANG WADA RESTURANT, Solapur - Restaurant Reviews & Photos - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
This restaurant is located on the Solapur Akkalkot highway. The atmosphere is very rustic and the place is well maintained. 
The taste of the food is average. Sugar cane juice was good.
Bathrooms are not very clean.

Name: SAFFRON, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Excellent food served with high quality live songs, which included Rabindrasangeet. Thoroughly enjoyed my dinner here.

Name: SAFFRON, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
We ordered the non veg combo for 2 during poilabaisakh from the park...
Even though most of the hotels had shut shop during the covid lockdown The Park had this wonderful offer going on.
The menu was sumptuous, the food even more so. Liked the...variety on offer for a traitional bengali meal.
The mutton dakbungalow and fish paturi deserves special mention.
Hope for more exciting offers in the near future.More

Name: SAFFRON, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
ON 16 MARCH 2020 I visited saffron
Out of the world experience 
Food quantity quality presentation is out of the world
The staff treats you with a lot of care 
Superb    

                                    Kaushik Chakraborty

Name: SAFFRON, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Really fantastic food, and service! Butter korma one night and mutton curry the other with Naan and rice. Served with pleasure by Rahul, two nights in a row, they treated me like royalty. Highly recommended.

Name: SAFFRON, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Saffron is a good option for fine dining inside the Park hotel.. the food ambience staff are to be wellmentioned.

Thanks Arpita for the wonderful hospitality served. Hoping to visit the place again!!

Name: SAFFRON, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Just Had dinner on 27 Feb'20 in Saffron The Park. The staff is well mannered and food quality is very good. Tidiness is also maintained. I was served by Mr. Rahul & Miss. Dipannika. Both were polite, well dressed, personable and generous. As had been...seen/observed, they were serving each and every guest with diligently. They served me in the same manner. I am completely happy with them. All the very best for your future. Rgds Sharad TiwariMore

Name: SAFFRON, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
This place in the park hotel was simply a delight!
I'm in love with the hospitality of the hotel and Mr Rahul.

Name: SAFFRON, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Delicious dishes, decent price, top quality and waiters loving doing their Jobs. Ask Rahul or any other waiter for some recommendations ...

Name: SAFFRON, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Had awesome time....food was awesome.. Ambience and service was very good. It is worth visiting again. @Rahul Dutta thanks for great service..will visit again

Name: SAFFRON, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: My Visit to Saffron ,The Park, Kolkata
Detail Review: We visited this restaurant today and we're totally surprised with the high level of local food we had. On top of that Dipannita helped us in the best way to select our dishes and also the desert for sure. She is a confident girl with...great attitude.More

Name: SAFFRON, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: It has been a wonderful lunch at saffron,tried jeera pulia, vetki paturi& chingri malai kari,those were mouthwondering.Mr Rahul Dutta was there who who gave us spellbound service.Thank you.

Name: SAFFRON, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
It was a nice meal. Our servers Dipannnita and Rahul were exceptional.
The only negative was that the fish was not deboned properly.

Name: SAFFRON, Kolkata (Calcutta) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Very good ambiance and also good food and service especially  by rahul and very much satisfied  by music by the live music band

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Wonderful restaurant for Goan cuisine. Also serves few North indian and Indo Chinese cuisine. Good ambience. Excellent service. Taste is great and yummy. Enjoyed the afternoon meal.

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Just visited the Lida BPS resturant margao today for lunch was excited & was having lot of expection about the place. In the beginning I was very happy cos my friends were working there so I was talking to them I ordered drinks staster roast...tongue was very good ,pork amsol was excellent only the steak what we ordered medium well turned up to be rare which was completely disappointing & we had to wait for an hour for a replacement. Manager was rud saying that you can't speak to my staff like that it's un ethical or else you may leave.which is realy unprofessional .I was just talking to my friends whome I worked with. So I don't think there is any ethical thing in that . First he should learn what does ethics mean & he doesn't have any right to talk to a customer like that.which is really unprofessional that is not called hospitality.will not recommend this place
Horrabel experience.More

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Amazing goan food and super fast service by Mr Sanjay 

Loved the pork solantulem and garlic butter fried squids

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: The restuarant is situated in the premises of the BPS Club in Margoa.Its open air and no frills place something like olden times Irani cafes with waiters and plain crockery.However the food makes up for all this.Excellent local Goan cuisine at very reasonable prices.They serve...both non veg including sea food and veg also but limited.They have a full bar very reasonably priced.Value for money.Must tryMore

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Good Goan food. Value for money.
Detail Review: I love the pepper garlic tongue here. The kids love their fried rice. Portion sizes here are generous.

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
We are members of BPS club and eat at this restaurant fairly regularly...but after a longish gap was very disappointed with the food..
Our veg dish was so spicy that we had to return it and felt the quality of food and service has gone...down...
Maida rotis ...cold and rubbery..
Dirty table cloths...
Sad though and disappointed that quality couldnt be maintained.More

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: The food served in this restaurant is tasty. But I'll go there again, only for lunch (if they serve it) and not for dinner, because in the evenings, hundreds of mosquitoes get in to bite viciously when you sit on the table. They have to...do something about them. A waiter put mosquito coils in empty soda bottles which didn't help at all. That is the reason I'm giving it only 4 and not 5 stars.More

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Awesome Prawn Curry Rice. Plenty of other good Goan dishes too. Decor has improved slightly on the outer  Non AC side but a decent makeover in the AC section. Good quick Service. Need to smile more.

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Lets Go to BPS - Anuska Resturant
Detail Review:
When You are in Margao City and Running out of option on the Non-Veg Restaurants, One Must Consider Anuska Resturant at the BPS Club.

Their Rice Plate is Famous (Fish-Curry-Rice) and you will be served in no Time, However, the Service Could be improved. Most...of the Items on the Menu are very good in Taste and Quantity. Food is Served Hot and Fresh. You will find the Place is always more than 50% Occupied. Parking will not be a problem.

The Ambiance of the Place is very average. It needs Improvement on the Service, Cleanliness and Presentation Front.More

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Anushka's restaurant at BPS Club Margao is the prefect place for someone looking for authentic Goan food! The fish thali here is quite popular and you find a lot of office crowd here at lunchtime! The pepper garlic of tongue is delicious!

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Very tasty food. especially the pepper garlic tongue is amazing. also prawns fried rice were delicious . Quantity is good also rates very reasonable. In all must try this place.

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Oasis for goan food in Margao
Detail Review:
Chilled out laid back and lacking in glamour. Anuska at BPS has a supper Goan fare on offer everytime. The fish is fresh and the masalas tasty.
The prices and very reasonable.

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: This restaurant is great for Goan Cuisine. Renowned for their seafood and lunch thalis. Prices are very reasonable and great when your out and about in the city.

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: This is a good location for Goan food. Don't miss the xacuti and the fish dishes. The ambience is okay, not great and polished as some of the more expensive places but the food is totally worth the price and tasty. After having visited the...place often, I have to say that the quality of the food is consistent. If you want good Goan food, don't miss the place.More

Name: ANOSHKA BAR & RESTAURANT, Margao - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Lovely goan food.. V good n fresh fish.. Superb reichado prawns .. Good chicken Biryani... Lovely chicken garlic wings.. Everthing is good.. Fried fish also good's. Superb service... Must visit when in margao

Name: UPRE, Udaipur - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Quote: Upre - Best view with great service
Detail Review:
Upre is a must visit for the beautiful view of the lake and great ambience. 
The service by Rakesh was prompt, polite and courteous. 
The food served is amazing too especially the Dhungaar Maas and the Fish Amritsari 
Overall a great experience.

Name: UPRE, Udaipur - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Very good food....lakefront location....friendly staff.....Indian food was superb...,Thai food was okay..  Kind of Indian style. 

Must try their dish tikka.....beer was really cold....unusual in India hahaha 

Need to get a tuk tuk as street very narrow

Name: UPRE, Udaipur - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
This was most recommended hotel and after visiting I understand that the recommendation is actually based on the fact that you get a good view of lake pichora. Food is like any other restaurants around the lake Pichora. 
Recommend to try alternatives if you want...to enjoy rajasthani delicaciesMore

Name: UPRE, Udaipur - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Over-hyped restaurant in Udaipur. There are places better or at least equivalent in terms of view and ambience and definitely better in terms of taste and service.

Name: UPRE, Udaipur - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: It was great .we love this place really so beautiful atmosphere at roof restaurant at upre and food is also delicius

Name: UPRE, Udaipur - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
This beautiful restaurant has the perfect combination of  photogenic location and mouth-watering dishes. 

The panoramic view from the restaurant makes it a perfect place for candlelight dinner in Udaipur, with a loved one. The fine-dine restaurant specialises in Rajasthani, North Indian and Continental and has...received rave ratings from the diners.

We were a group of five , and enjoyed the ambience and the food . Service can be better . Seems like staff have now started to take guests for granted.

Tips : a lake view seat is a must if dining here . There are only a couple dining options which is one floor above and a better view of the lake . Live music makes evening enchanted.More

Name: UPRE, Udaipur - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Location and service was great but food a bit pricey and nothing special. Max 2 hour sittings on a Saturday night.

Name: UPRE, Udaipur - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Went for dinner at upre restaurant.. Located at 3rd floor of lake pichola hotel.
View from restaurant is amazing.. Decor ambience is unmatchable.
Food and service both are very average. Won't recommend if looking for great food..

Name: UPRE, Udaipur - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
We had a good time at the Upre restaurant. It has a great view and and the best view the city can offer. 
Although it was slightly difficult to get a spot on a Saturday night, the host was very helpful. 

Staff Surender Singh was...calm and exceptional in his service. He made sure to maintain the vibe of the place by his composed demeanour.More

Name: UPRE, Udaipur - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: I recently dined at UPRE. I would not suggest this place to anyone as the managers were unprofessional and left a negative impression on my dining experience. They refused to listen to our concerns and made us feel as if our feedback was not important.

Name: UPRE, Udaipur - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Would highly recommend Upre for a dinner if you happen to be in Udaipur. While they were sold out for that entire weekend, somehow we got accommodated by the brilliant efforts by Mr Dilip so we could celebrate our anniversary dinner there.

He was very...polite, not crumbling under the immense pressure of walk-ins and kept checking on us constantly while we dined there on service and food. The little touches of peanuts/papad etc to go with drinks were much appreciated.

The food was superb and the view magical!More

Name: UPRE, Udaipur - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Quote: Excellent service and dinner with a view!
Detail Review:
What a fantastic place!! Excellent service and good food. We were three persons and was lucky to get a table at the edge, enjoying the magnificent view of the old city. 
Taking the service level and location into consideration, the price level is very affordable.

Name: UPRE, Udaipur - Menu, Prices & Restaurant Reviews - Tripadvisor
Quote: OVERHYPED, UNHYGENIC FOOD,RUNNING ON AMBIENCE ONLY
Detail Review:
The only positive of this place is its Ambience.

On every other scale this place fairs very badly.
We had a Non veg Platter. Had a doubt whether the food was fresh and Lo and behold, my 10 year old son ended up with vomiting...and diarrhea, a sure sign that the food was really stale.

The staff was indeed rude. 

To top it all the prices are all jacked up and No value for the money

Best to avoid the placeMore

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: The crowds in this restaurant are just unbelievable - indicates the strong brand / pull of this place. The service is quick and the food is delicious but the crowds just do not allow you to have a relaxed meal.

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Treasure Trove of Vegetarian South Indian Fare in Nariman Point!
Detail Review:
Popped in at 4.30 pm with Hunger Pangs due to a Skipped Lunch

Was Well-Rewarded with Top Quality Freshly prepared South Indian Staples - Rasam Wada & Crisp Ghee Sada Onion Rava Dosa!

Very Good and Attentive Service at that time of the day as...Restaurant was not very crowded.

I put my phone on Silent mode to Focus Solely on the Divinely tasting dishes - and I was so Happy I did that!More

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: I have been visiting this place for over 50 years. Everytime I come to India and Mubai. I have lots of memories here with my late mother and families and has the best south Indin, Gujarati, Punjabi desserts. Clean, good service and great food and...yes you do pay extra for all the best food/service but worth it. I enjoy it every time and god knows been over 100 times over the years.More

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Had the Gujurati Thali here and the food was absolutely brilliant! As vegetarians this was probably some of the best food we had in India. The restaurant is quite upmarket butthe service was still friendly and fast. The Thali seems like good value for money...given the classiness of the restaurant and great quality of food.More

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Highly recommend for a great lunch
Detail Review: Great place to eat, fabulous food and fast service. This was really busy with office workers having lunch. It was one of the most popular places on the street. I had masala dosa that could not be faulted

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Excellent vegetarian food and great value for money. A very large selection of plates, all very flavoursome and for extremely reasonable prices. Went twice, once for lunch and once for dinner.

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Nice for any type food lunch, dinner and breakfast
Detail Review: It is one of most ventured restaurants of South Mumbai for long time. They offer varieties across Indian and fusion cuisine. If you want to enjoy quick food, it is most preferred place to have food. Must try is rasam vadai

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Top top service- best best staff - a must visit
Detail Review:
Top class service, huge choice, great great staff.

Visited this place 6 years ago. 
This time we were back in Trident Nariman Point and this restaurant is right 5 minutes back from our hotel. 
We were welcomed by the doorman and then the attending staff...displayed most warm service. They were very sensitive not to bring appetizers and main courses too quickly. Waiter Sattapa did the liaison with the kitchen for our specific needs. 
Virendra Yadav was at our table even before we waived our hands and looked after us so well. Ganesh gave his advice and explanation on dishes we were ordering. 
Finally manager Mr Suresh Pai and DN Misra could not help but came to talk to us and then it became a visit never to be forgotten. 
We were simply overwhelmed by an outstanding service given to us by all of the above and many more. 
Their place is always full but for them to give us so much attention is a testimony of the fact that Customer is God to them. 

Hygienic 
Top class service
Efficient
Huge serviceMore

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: It is an average restaurant, weekends are always crazy and to much waiting for table. Staff is good but some improvement in food part

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: I visited open area of restaurant. Yes, this restaurant has two separate premises for food. One is inside closed area ie room restaurant and another is outside open galleria. Open gallery area premises opens at 08:30 AM while closed area premises starts serving guests at...11:30 AM. I visited open area premises at 09:00 AM on one occasion and 15:00 Hrs on another occasion. I ordered medu vada saambhar and idlis on one occasion and only idlis saambhar on another occasion. But ordered for filter coffee on both occasions. Food quality is good and coffee really awesome! They keep saambhar bowls on each table in gallery area. It tempts me. Ambiance excellent. Usually office goers visit this restaurant. I love to visit here.More

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
It was quite a good lunch with good services, But food was average in taste.
As there weren't many options in the menu.

Overall good place.

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Excellent south indian food
Service is polite, and there are plenty of staff in circulation. 

Their dosa, idli, vada and sambhar are so fresh and hot and yummy. Sambhar is a little on the sweet note. 

A new dish I tried this time was the...mini vada pav, pic attached. 10 pieces were served as bite sized portions held together with a tooth-pick. Super yummy and a must try!More

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
It was my second visit to this beautiful restaurant after a very long time, may be 6/7 years. I had Idli and Onion Uttapam. Both the dishes were of top quality with tasty chutney and unlimited sambhar. The service was excellent, my server Ganesh was...very courteous and quick. In spite of being a weekday it was totally full.
Value for money...More

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Welcoming staff,  tasty food, perfect package. We had 3 meals in 4 days at Status and every single time it was just awesome. Specific mention about: Cheese chilli toast, Cheese balls in garlic sauce and Paneer Tikka masala curry..

Name: STATUS, Mumbai - 208 Regent Chambers, South Mumbai - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: We had evening snacks at Status which included samosa chaat and bruschetta. The samosa chaat was decent but the bruschetta was terrible and I wouldn't recommend it at all. Maybe it was the dish we ordered, and we should have stuck to Indian food but...it dampened my experience at Status. Service was decent, and the ambience is good. Probably a good place for Indian food, but avoid continental orders.More

Name: MY WIFZ PLACE, Dehradun District - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Recently visited the place which a fine dine restaurant serving the best quality food 
We ordered around 4 starters and 4 main course which had the optimum quantity and great quality that tasted really good 
Bar is also available 
The service was very quick and...the staff was very polite 
over all it was a really good experienceMore

Name: MY WIFZ PLACE, Dehradun District - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Seating Suggest Family or 5 or More
Detail Review: We opted for the Indian portion of the menu. Nothing particularly to ‘write home about’.  A standard Muttar Paneer,Chicken dish, garlic Nan, SL Soda and Jerri rice. All well prepared and very good service.  These seatings are quite large and tables well dressed.  Must be...the fasting period as we were the only ones in attendance. Opted to pay with International Visa Card.. worked in 4 continents including India but with 2 x “Pin Ok “ was told “machine is not accepting your Card”. So paid in cash and suggested the replace their machine.  Requested my bill be marked Paid and Signed.More

Name: MY WIFZ PLACE, Dehradun District - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: While searching for a good food joint for lunch someone suggested us this restaurant and we were very satisfied with the food quality and the ambience. Their pineapple raita is very delicious. Overall a good place to visit.

Name: MY WIFZ PLACE, Dehradun District - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: A must stop - the name is so catchy
Detail Review: Had an enjoyable meal with family. The first time was all by myself a few years back - and with a photo in front of the restaurant. Visited with family. The meal was good and very well presented. The ambience and service was excellent. extremely...courteous and helpful staff.More

Name: MY WIFZ PLACE, Dehradun District - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Service staff was very courteous and knowledgeable. Elegant ambiance. They have live kitchen. I went there on the day of Dry day so unfortunately couldn’t get the change to have beer, as i am beer lover. Food was really very delicious. Must visit place with...family or any kind of family gathering.More

Name: MY WIFZ PLACE, Dehradun District - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
This is one of the best restaurants in Dehradun. Excellent food complemented by class service. Service is non intrusive and gives customer space. I have been there thrice in last 1 month. 1 person (I think he is either manager or captain) is particularly friendly...to kids. A must try if you are around Rajpur. 
Upkeep of surrounding areas could be better. (Restaurant is in proper shape, shops around it need maintainence)More

Name: MY WIFZ PLACE, Dehradun District - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: One of the good restaurants of Dehradun serving good food. Service is also good, staff is responsive.

Name: MY WIFZ PLACE, Dehradun District - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Time to confuse my friends with "tonight I am eating at My Wife's Place ". We were early being just turned 6pm but got the last available parking slot. A very extensive menu and I  note a rather large  Bar and Cocktail menu. .if that...is a preference you might have.  We ordered a Palak Paneer, Egg Briyani, 3 Garlic Naan  & Sweet Lime Sodas NO ice. Great service  and excellent decor.   Yes even a finger bowl at the end.More

Name: MY WIFZ PLACE, Dehradun District - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: My wife's place is the real place where u can enjoy a good food along with bar.  The ambience inside is quite unique.  Food quality was good but taste i do not like that much as it is wth other restaurants nearby. But its a...good place to visit.  Ample parking with prompt service.More

Name: MY WIFZ PLACE, Dehradun District - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Its a lounge-bar restaurant and offers you excellent cuisines
Non veg is a speciality here and a glass of beer will enhance it

Name: MY WIFZ PLACE, Dehradun District - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor

Name: JIMMY'S KITCHEN, Kolkata (Calcutta) - 7/1a Acharya Jagadish Chandra Bose Road Opposite Punjab National Bank - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: This is serious. In 2020 January I was visiting Kolkata like I do every year. No boasting but a fact...I have realised I do not have the immunity that I used to have for my gut tolerance. Every place that I ate I had problems....The only place I did not have any issues is Jimmy’s Kitchen on AJC Bose Road (I cannot vouch for other branches if they have any). Food was hot and I tried my favourite Gravy Chowmein and dry Chilli Chicken. Please note that I did not have water there not even bottled water but had Limca which was unfortunately poured in a glass before I could stop that from happening. But even after that I had no problem. Thank you Jimmy’s Kitchen! Please make sure the food is hot in temperature!More

Name: JIMMY'S KITCHEN, Kolkata (Calcutta) - 7/1a Acharya Jagadish Chandra Bose Road Opposite Punjab National Bank - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: A Place to Find the Authentic Flavour of "Calcutta Chinese" Food
Detail Review:
80s was my teenage period, 70s was the decade when I first got taste of "Calcutta Chinese". Now, my daughter is about about to leave her teenage status. 

I was trying to share with my daughter the Kolkata Chinese flavour that I grew up with....That smoky flavour of Cantonese style noodles (Gravy Noodles, that we call it these days) and succulent roast pork. Jimmy's Kitchen was on the radar for quite some time, but somehow we missed it for some reason or the other. Finally, it was the day and we (with my wife and daughter) entered the Jimmy's.

I was taken back to the 70s and 80s with the decor. I could still identify the seating arrangement and looked for the tables where I sat with my father, mother and sister. I wanted to sit there, but they were already reserved. So, we got a table in one of the well decorated cubicles, (yes, you still get that cozy comfort of the cubicles).

We ordered shrimp noodles and roast pork. The food continued the nostalgia. At last, I got that smoky, moist flavour of Cantonese noodles that I got in my childhood and teenage days. I miss this flavour in  the modern "Chinese" restaurants. Finally, I could share my childhood experience of Chinese food with my daughter.

The price is like any other good Chinese restaurant and the quantity is "OK". One plate of noodles is enough for a person with good appetite. The roast pork was appreciated well by my daughter who found such item too dry at most of the other places. 

At last, the service. 

It was prompt. The food came within minutes of ordering.

I read in some reviews where the people were not very happy with the service. But to me the service was just of the right measure. The people did not intrude on your privacy, but were experienced enough to serve you the right thing at the right moment. I ordered two plates of noodles and asked them to serve a third plate after some time. It was served just when our plates were going to be empty, and served hot. The water glasses were filled as soon as they got empty.

I left with a happy experience, not only because I relived my childhood memories, but also because I could share such memory, in reality, with my daughter.

HIGHLY RECOMMENDED - ROAST PORKMore

Name: JIMMY'S KITCHEN, Kolkata (Calcutta) - 7/1a Acharya Jagadish Chandra Bose Road Opposite Punjab National Bank - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Centrally located, good food, liquor is served, authentic dishes . . . what more could you ask for ?? Recommended

Name: JIMMY'S KITCHEN, Kolkata (Calcutta) - 7/1a Acharya Jagadish Chandra Bose Road Opposite Punjab National Bank - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Jimmy's Kitchen was close to where I grew up. So I have memories of having eaten its food.  It is also a place that my friend has fond childhood memories of. So we both decided to go there after...yes, almost 20 years or more.
Bad...idea.
You can NEVER go back.
Anyway we had Fish fingers which was an excellent dish.8 pieces in all.We also wanted dumplings but the gent who took the order said it would take at least half an hour to be made afresh...so ....
Then we had mixed fried rice and chilli chicken boneless...Good enough except that the rice was tinged red and wasn't the fried rice I associate with Chinese cuisine in Calcutta (OK, Kolkata). Was it tasty. Yes...but it wasn't what I was expecting...hoping to get and the chilli chicken oozing oil, though Ok enough, fell far short of expectations.
Ah! Expectations...that's what is tripping up Jimmy's...it is more of a Bar now I see...and a group of loud hard drinking young boys and girls really spoilt our enjoyment of the food.
I found the prices extremely reasonable. The above mentioned items and one ice cream  cost us about Rs1100/-
In addition, my friend ordered noodles and chicken to take back home for those who couldn't come. Her feedback was not good the next day. Stringy, hard chicken and average noodles.
I brought back Chilli chicken on the bone (dry and stringy), fried rice (average) and Manchurian chicken (nothing to write home about).
So we laid the memories to rest.
Bottom line. Good enough place still if you are in the locality and hungry. But I wouldn't recommend it anew to someone as a must-try eatery nor drive down in a totally opposite direction from home to have a meal here.
At best it is a good, solid standard food serving type restaurant to be patronized by the locals...I was once one; no more. So many nice, new places have some up...nostalgia can only do so much!More

Name: JIMMY'S KITCHEN, Kolkata (Calcutta) - 7/1a Acharya Jagadish Chandra Bose Road Opposite Punjab National Bank - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor

good array...of options on the menu.

Name: JIMMY'S KITCHEN, Kolkata (Calcutta) - 7/1a Acharya Jagadish Chandra Bose Road Opposite Punjab National Bank - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: My husband and I were in a party of 6, having Sunday lunch in this restaurant. We have had Chinese food in many restaurants around the world, but Jimmy’s is second to none. The service was perfectly attentive but not intrusive, the restaurant was sparkling...clean with pleasant, relaxed atmosphere, and the value for money was outstanding. The quality was obvious:  fresh ingredients, perfect seasoning, vegetables cooked crisp-tender instead of mushy or left raw, and items were cut up into consistently-sized pieces (a mark of excellent prep work). At home now in the USA, I really miss Jimmy’s and can’t wait to return with our Kolkata friends!More

Name: JIMMY'S KITCHEN, Kolkata (Calcutta) - 7/1a Acharya Jagadish Chandra Bose Road Opposite Punjab National Bank - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Great chinese food at one of the oldest in the city
Detail Review: This place has still got the panache of whiffing up some mean Chinese food, read Indian style. For every foreigner in India, you must know that Chinese here is not exactly the Chinese you know outside. Here, it sort of has this Indian twist about...it which is its own cuisine by the way and scrumptious but a bit on the spicy side.So if you are not a big fan of spice you may not like this affair but you may always tell the chef to tone it down a bit. This restaurant is out on the main road so parking may be a bit of a pickle. The seating inside isn't much and can house not more than 40 people give or take and therefore you may need to wait to be seated if you are unlucky. Not sure that they accept reservation. The food is simply out of this world and they have managed to keep the same great taste through the years. They have a full bar as well. If you are looking for great Chinese food of the Indian variety and want an option other than Park Street, this is the place to be.More

Name: LEMON TWIST (ORIENTAL WOK AND GRILL), Noida - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
The menu has a good variety to choose from, it however lacks the description of
the dishes. The menu has too many categories, it needs to be simplified; the variety
however is worth a mention. 

We ordered "Exotic mushrooms tossed in butter garlic sauce": The...mushrooms arrived in
around 10 minutes The portion size was sufficient, but the presentation of the dish was below the restaurant standard. Mushrooms of varying sizes were kind of deep fried in butter garlic to the extent that some pieces had got burnt. The mushrooms clearly had not been tossed but deep fried. The mushrooms were served on a nice platter, the lettuce leaf and carrot decoration by the side looked old and stale.

The mild garlic flavor was good, the dish could have fared well had it not been
carelessly prepared.

Another dish that we ordered was Broccoli baby corn in hot sauce: The dish was mildly flavored and was not at all hot as the name suggested. Presentation of the dish again was a disappointment, the vegetables had lost their bright color and the dish looked dull and unappetizing. 

Service was good..More

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: One of the Best Goan Dining Experiences
Detail Review:
Had heard about this place from a local. Ended up here as a part of a Food Walk, and Viva Panjim didn't disappoint. 
It's a family home turned restaurant in the streets of Fontainhas. 
Had the Chicken Xacuti, Prawn Vindaloo, Vegetable Caldinha with Pav for...dinner, along with Feni Limca - The original Feni Cocktail. 
Also tried the Bebinca and Serradura and that was the cherry on top. 
Would definitely recommend you guys check it out. You won't regret it.More

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Beautiful heritage home turned into a restaurant. Nice place, good food. Service a bit slow. Overall nice experience. Must visit place for authentic Goan cuisine. Prawn Curry with Goan rice, Veg Goan curry with Basmati rice is delicious. Thoroughly enjoyed afternoon lunch.

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Specially for the Goan taste and food lovers..
Detail Review: Awesome food with authentic Goan flavours. The Fish curry with Goan rice was truly amazing and brought that old Goa taste (while most other restaurants serve curry with basmati rice). Also their cocktails, especially the Fenny based were wonderful. Serving was fast and the atmosphere/decor...made it feel like having food in a heritage Goan home.More

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Excellent  Choice for Goan and Continental food
Detail Review: A well known and award winning restaurant, Viva Panjim is located uniquely inside a byalley in the Fontainhas quarter. It serves a good variety of Goan food, both the Konkani and the Portguese variety.  We tried lots of things across two occasions. The must-have is...surely their Chilly Chicken Fry cooked in Goan spices. As also their Prawn sauteed in goan spices. The Apricot sauce steak (Pork/Chicken we tried both) is unique and worth a try. The goan curried dishes are good but not great. We had their Portuguese- Macanese dessert- Seradura which in recent times has become a Goan favorite. It is an absolutely sinful and awesome dessert. Their ambience and cozy inn type setting makes for long, liesurely lunches or dinners... Do try it onceMore

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Viva Panjim in Fontainhas is an absolutely incredible restaurant that should not be missed. Its ambience exudes a perfect blend of rustic charm and contemporary elegance, creating a unique and inviting atmosphere. Our visit was made even more memorable by the attentive and knowledgeable service...provided by Alok, a true gentleman who guided us through the menu and recommended delightful options tailored to our preferences. The overall experience was excellent, and the Orange Honey glazed chicken steak, in particular, proved to be a truly worthwhile indulgence. The flavors, presentation, and value for money exceeded our expectations, leaving us thoroughly satisfied with our dining experience at Viva Panjim.More

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
The food was awesome.... It is a house converted in to a hotel. We had Veg and Non-veg food. In fact, we had one of the best Veg. Sizzlers here. Satya helped us to choose dishes and thanks for it. Yes, the food was awesome,...but the praise the staff has for the owner of the restaurant make this place more likeable. 
We will definitely visit Viva Panjim whenever we visit Panjim for sure...
Kudos to the entire team!!!!!More

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: The food was by far the best I have eaten in Goa .. very authentic.. the ambience is quaint and lovely too

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Lovely small Goan restaurant hidden in the back streets of Fontainhas. Staff were friendly and attentive. The food was delicious, we had Vegetable Biryani and Chicken Cafreal, both delicious. Would definitely recommend visiting but you need to get there early to bag a table!

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
The restaurant is not very easy to find, somehow hidden in a side small street. It doesn’t only have Goan food, but also continental/Italian and Chinese. I went for local delicacies, though not the very spicy ones. The chicken Cafreal was delicious and  so was...the Goan Vegetable Caldinha. 
Unfortunately, traveling solo I could not taste more plates. Sad.
The atmosphere is simple but engaging. Small but quite busy. The service good and the waiters knew well the dishes. Highly recommended.More

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Food was very oily. Reminded me of bad Indian restaurants in UK. We ordered off the Goan menu and it was not Goan. More like North Indian. Would never return.

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Good Resturant for Lunch Not Dinner
Detail Review:
Family Owned Resturant with Good Food when the Owner is present so Lunch is Good been there Twice and Lunch All Dishes we had Pork , Beef , Sorpotal , Steak , Pulao Prawn Curry etc was Awesome , Come next Day Dinner the Owner...was not present and Every Dish the Chef cooked Both Pork Dishes were just FAT , one dish was taken back not billed the other we had half and was billed which shouldn't have , Butter Garlic Prawns also were soggy , The Sausage Pulao was good another dish we ordered was also not good , Resturant is Cozy and you need to wait for tables in Afternoon cause the Owner is there and Food and Service is Excellent but wouldn't recommend Dinner there , Thier Caramel Pudding is Also Awesome sharing some pictures 
Recommended for Lunch Not DinnerMore

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: In the old Portuguese part Panjim tucked down a side street. Comprehensive menu with a mixture of Indian and Chinese cuisine.

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: This restaurant provides excellent food at very modest prices. Service is excellent. The menu is comprehensive and tantalising. The pork and the curried prawns were both superb. Well worth visiting. I would definitely go there again, but there is lots of competition in Panjim and...not enough days!More

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: A small place offering authentic Goan cuisine. The fish dishes are a must try. Ample choices available for drinks too. We liked the place

Name: VIVA PANJIM - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
Ambience- Local, homely
Hospitality- Very warm
Food quality- Doable, not great
Value for money- Good

We went there for dinner. I am a vegetarian so I had the local rice and veg in coconut gravy. It was very well prepared.
My husband had Goan Prawn...curry and felt it was an average preparation.

What I liked was the local feel, the simplicity with which we were served and since we went there pretty pate, there was a lot of peace too.More

Name: THE INDIAN GRILL, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Halal, Gluten Free Options
Quote: Very nice restaurant with great tasting food
Detail Review:
Me and my friends have had dinner twice now at The Indian Grill. The last time we had some Indian dishes incl. Chicken Tika and a Mutton Curry, all accompanied with Naan (which you need to order separately). 
Everything was well prepared and served on...a plate in a pleasant way. The dishes tasted delicious. 
Staff was very friendly but eager to ensure that you’ll come back for breakfast the next day (which we couldn’t promise because there are other attractive places in the area). 
The restaurant is attached to a hotel where you can go if you decide to make use of the restrooms). Everything very clean and high standard. 
Certainly recommended if you stay in this neighborhood.More

Name: THE INDIAN GRILL, New Delhi - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Cusine: Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Halal, Gluten Free Options
Detail Review:
This place is the only place to eat in Paharganj. The food is awesome. Mostly it is Indian food, which I do not like that much. Is that a problem???? No way. Chef Raju will make your favourite meal to suit your taste. He is...amazing and always has a friendly smile and always prepared to assist.

I asked if he could prepare a veg egg burger for me and after asking what I liked and didn't like, he produced the most tasty burger I have ever eaten (see the picture)

I also go to this place for my breakfast as it has a great variety buffet each morning, including western type foods. 

I have to say, ALL the staff here are warm and friendly and smiling. They are happy to greet you and make you feel special. This service is OUTSTANDING. This is without doubt the best little restauant in the area. Highly recommended. It is situated in the Godwin Hotel.

I will be going back for more and more!!!!!More

Name: ISYS, Bengaluru - Jayanagar - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Good food, slow service & lazy staff
Detail Review:
We eat at the Isys frequently, though I wouldn't call us regulars; recently we ate their last Saturday, 30th of Jan, 2016. 

We usually prefer a la carte, and both of us decided to have Continental, with Chinese style jade corn soup to start with....The soup arrived after some 20 minutes, and even to serve water, we had to struggle to get the wait-staff's attention.

The restaurant wasn't busy by any standards, some 40% occupied, maybe. In the table next to us, two gentlemen were being fawned over by one of the senior members of the wait staff, and also by a couple of waiters. I get that they might have some VIP eating that day, and they want to provide special service, but ignoring other paying guests is not on!

The soup was NOTHING BUT SWEET CORN SOUP WITH GREEN COLORING! :( It was pathetic, to say the least. We usually go there for the parking convenience, but even that wouldn't tempt me now. :(

The vegetable moussaka was okay; I had cannelloni, and instead of spinach and ricotta cheese, it was a shock to me that they had used spinach and mushrooms. If you're using mushrooms, you better mention it, as many Indian vegetarians prefer to avoid it. It was finely chopped and so I had to keep picking the mushrooms off!

The dessert was nice - we had fresh lychees with rabdi. Maybe a tad too sweet for our tastes, but otherwise it was okay.

I don't remember the service being this bad; a bunch of the waiters were just standing and chatting in one corner, and we had to keep waving our hands above our heads to get service!!!

Hope they improve.More

Name: ISYS, Bengaluru - Jayanagar - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: The ambience of the restaurant was good and the food quality was also decent. The service quality is average.

Name: ISYS, Bengaluru - Jayanagar - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
I am writing this just after finishing my lunch. Wide selection of Indian, Italian and Chinese/Thai dishes were available in the buffet. Probably over 50 items including Soup, salads, hot veggie and non-veg appetizers, main courses and deserts were available. 
I got to try a...few. Lasooni (garlic) tandoori chicken was pretty well cooked and soft. Mutton dum biriyani was at par with my expectations, lacked mutton pieces, but spices were good. Dal was quite bland, lacked seasonings. Bhindi masala was good. 
Service is mediocre. Was seated at a small table right at the entrance, even if quite a few tables were lying empty. After I asked for different table, was seated in a decent area. Did not tell me that if I wanted to have roti or naan, I had to order. Was told at the end. Waiter showed up just once during my meal. 
Ambience is ok, seemed like too many tables in a small space.More

Name: ISYS, Bengaluru - Jayanagar - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Quote: Average food and service, not impressed
Detail Review:
Isys at Hotel President is very close to where I stay but we don't go here very often.
Happened to visit it for lunch today, and incidentally they were having a "Chettinad Festival", which we were not aware of.

The decore was done up differently...which looked good, but the neon lighting was still on.

Isys serves a buffet at lunch, and this time it was a chettinad buffet with a host of different dishes.
There were 3 veg and 3 non-veg starters. I tried 3 among these including the chicken 65, mutton balls and gobi pakora. Also, the mutton soup, which was sadly full of bones!
None of them were memorable. Very ordinary.

For the mains there were many dry and gravy veggies, but i never like vegetarian dishes in chettinad cuisine. So i stuck to the fish curry and chicken pepper curry with rice. This was followed by some rasam. The rasam was good, but otherwise the food was very average.
 
There was also a live counter serving ghee roast idlis.

The dessert counter had 6-7 items, I tried the chandrahara which is one of my favourites. It was good unlike the dry and overly sweet rava ladoo. The ada payasam was not bad, but low on sugar.

Service was not bad, and pricing is not unjustified. But the main question is, does it deserve another visit? Probably not i'd say.More

Name: ISYS, Bengaluru - Jayanagar - Restaurant Reviews & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review:
I went to Isys on a weekday with colleagues as it was our quarterly time out. In fact, we were a huge group, almost 30 people. The interior straight away caught my eye, lit in light blue giving a very serene feeling. The spread was...laid out neatly on one side. The spread looked quite interesting. 
I started with the soup, for a change it was a noodles veg soup, which was quite ok. At least, it was not the usual tomato soup like I find in many buffets. Like wise, there was at least one "very different" dish in main course, starters, and salads. Salads were quite good, am a big fan of cold pasta salad and Isys did not disappoint me. One stand out dish was the cold cut veg dish, which had round shaped paneer, cold and a dash of cheese added on top, served on a small leaf. Absolutely loved it. Cold cut meat is the norm, but never heard of cold cut veg dish. Both presentation and taste was good. Main course was also quite good, it had the usual biriyani, fried rice, one paneer dish, etc. But again one stand out dish was a south east asian dish, not able to remember the name, but had aubergine (brinjal) and other veggies in a sauce. It tasted quite good. Again thumbs up for providing another "not so usual" dish in the spread. There was also a live counter, they were making moong dal dosa. I am not sure if they always have the live counter or if they prepare different dish each time, however, I skipped it because this is something we make at home quite regularly. 
Moving on to dessert, the spread was again quite good. I guess the stand out dish was rabdi jalebi, but I liked all the other desserts on the offering too. At least they did not have fruits. I hate it when restaurants offer fruits and count them as desserts. 
Overall, I liked the buffet very much, though some of my other veggie colleagues did not like it that much. Non-veg lovers might like the place too. My ratings are as below.
Ambiance: 4/5
Food: 4.5/5 (Mainly because of the innovative dishes)
Service: 4

I hope to come back here, and would really like to see some innovative dishes.More

Name: CURRY CHATTY, Thiruvananthapuram (Trivandrum) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
Detail Review: Been to the Curry Chatty Restaurant with family and friends and must say that I just love dining here because of the authentic Kerala food and the ambiance. Though they have Chinese and Thai food I prefer the Kerala style food they serve like Puttu,...Kallappam, Kappa Varieties, Beef dishes, Mutton, Chicken, Seafood items etc. Kappa Biriyani, Pothu Porichathu, Aadu Porichathu, Kozhi Mappas, Kozhi Pollichathu, Kana Roast, Kallummekkaya Ularthu, Konchu Roast, Neymeen Mappaas, Neymeen Moliee etc are few of the side dishes which are really good. The traditional Kerala style ambience of the restaurant and the excellent service provided by the staff makes this restaurant perfect to dine with family or friends.More

Name: CURRY CHATTY, Thiruvananthapuram (Trivandrum) - Restaurant Reviews, Photos & Phone Number - Tripadvisor
